name: Bullet Trail
description: Bullet Trail is a stunning puzzle and action game where you need to guide a bullet towards your target in order to win. You will need to use all your agility and attention in order to win and bring in the ultimate game experience. This is a very intense, fun gameplay idea that helps you test your aiming skills and reaction time. If you love arcade games and puzzles, try out Bullet Trail today. You have lots of cool quests and interesting gameplay ideas you can check out. It’s a rewarding, yet intense game experience!

name: Countdown
description: An asymmetrical multiplayer game with up to 12 players. Humans VS Androids. Survive and outwit your opponent!

name: OnlyCans: Thirst Date
description: Attempt to seduce a variety of bubbly and sparkling drinks cans in this sensual experience.

name: Wrestling Empire
description:
Recalling the genre's 64-bit heyday, this is wrestling that puts the fun first - filling the ring with as many wrestlers as you can handle and letting them loose with freestyle animation where anything could happen at any moment. Design matches before your very eyes with the intuitive setup process, and tag in up to 4 controllers at ANY time for old school multiplayer!

Or create your own star and embark on a career to encounter up to 350 opponents across 10 different rosters in an endless schedule of possibilities. Make the right moves backstage as well as in the ring to fight for your worth and retire with a career worth remembering. Just when you think you've seen it all, you can even save your changes to each character to make the world your own and never get bored of wrestling again!

• Epic universe of 350 characters across 10 different rosters - and up to 30 of them in the ring loaded instantly!

• Gaming's most engrossing simulation of life as a wrestler - from contract negotiations to weekly news reports.

• Door-to-door interactivity trusts you to make your own entrance AND walk back through the curtain.

• Unique animation system allows any move to transition into any other at any moment for mind-blowing spots that you'll want to catch on camera!

• Enjoy the action from different camera angles to suit any playing style.

• Interactive tutorial makes wrestling easy to play yet satisfying to master.

• Design matches & arenas before your very eyes with the most intuitive setup process in wrestling.

• Tag in up to 4 friends at ANY time for old school multiplayer on the same screen.

• Own once and forever with no micro-transactions or added costs - even as the concept continues to evolve.

name: The Dead in my Living Room
description:
As Jack awoke one night from uneasy dreams, a corpse was lying in front of him on the floor of his living room...

What had happened?

name: Human or Virus
description: Two years after the outbreak of the new coronavirus, the virus has mutated. You will lead your team to face a group of zombies, intelligent robots and various mutant beasts.

name: Batman: The Junkyard Challenge
description:
Do you love Batman, but yearn for more? Do you find the game to be too easy? Are you looking for a challenge? If so then this may be the hack for you.

This hack came about because of conversations with Batman speedrunner junkyard_dave wherein existing hacks of the game were lamented. This hack aims to rectify the situation by providing a new and difficult experience for anyone daring enough to attempt The Junkyard Challenge.

This hack features all new (and significantly more difficult) stages. Other changes that add to the challenge include enemy placements/health and boss AI. The item drop tables have also been changed. Though difficult, note that damage boosts are not required in this hack. It is possible that some maneuvers that require sub-pixel precision to avoid damage have slipped through the cracks, but this would be no more than a few instances. If well executed nearly all (if not actually all) of the game should be playable damage-less.

name: Manbomber
description:
An explosive homage to the old-time multiplayer classic made with PICO-8! In this game, your goal is to drop bombs on the battlefield to eliminate all other players in time and be the last manbomber standing.

The game can be played with up to 4 players battling each other. While in the 2-player mode, both players can use the same keyboard to control their manbomber, a controller for each player is required for all other modes. Any Controller which can be connected to your device will do!

name: The Shapeshifter
description: Are you ready for an unforgettable adventure? 'The Shapeshifter' is an 8-bit classic point and click adventure game for the original Game Boy and other compatible systems. In this game, you will become Elliot, an ordinary person spending the weekend in the mountains with friends. But what was supposed to be a peaceful camping trip turns into an incredible fantasy world full of humour and mystery.

name: Pokémon Black & White 3: Genesis
description: Black and White 3: Genesis is a hack of Pokemon Crystal Version. It is a sequel to Black 2/White 2 Versions, and takes place in Unova, a number of years following the events of B2/W2. In this game, you play as a young trainer from Humilau City, and will embark on a journey around the region to catch Pokemon, collect Gym badges, and thwart the plans of a mysterious group claiming to be Team Plasma, a terror group that was supposedly disbanded years ago.

name: Undertale: Bits and Pieces
description: Undertale: Bits and Pieces is a mod of Undertale featuring completely overhauled graphics, new areas, new enemies and remixed music, as well as backporting content from its successor Deltarune

name: Outsp4ce
description: Our tiny green triangle tries to destroy enemies in the shape of red circles that are approaching our world by shooting them.

name: Fat Prisoner Simulator 3
description: Fat Prisoner Simulator 3 - a hockey simulator where you are going to play the role of a prisoner. Each team consists of three players. Your have to score as many goals in the opponent’s net as you can in order to win the match.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Cyberpunk
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Sir Stretchalot
description: Put on the helmet and become more than a man. Become Sir Stretchalot, a Stretcher who travels the land, saving the day and stretching hotties, whether they be Monster Girls or regular girls. Sir Stretchalot is an episodic experience. New episodes will be added regularly.

name: Curiosaurios Club: Un Viaje Espacial
description: Space themed casual game for kids. On this game, Sami and Codi will travel trough Solar System discovering some curiosities about planets.

name: Revenot
description:
Revenot is an offline low poly game mix of action RPG and Roguelike.
It features procedurally generated maps in open scenes, making the game feels like a open world RPG, still being light and running smoothly on most mobile devices.

name: I Had Another Dream About You Last Night
description: A short pixel adventure about dreams, crushes, and moving on.

name: A Crooked Heart
description: A Crooked Heart is a traditionally animated, side scrolling adventure about Lulu and Orion, the last of the Corgis, fighting to protect their world from Seavus.

name: VirtualSociety
description:
Explore the virtual world and customize every detail, from your character to your home, and much more. 
 
Choose how you look and dress, then decide how you want to live. Design and build incredible homes for each family, then decorate them with your favorite furniture and design. 
 
Have a walk in town and talk to the other players to learn more about their lives. Challenge them on multiplayer games or spend your life with them! 
 
Tell your own stories in your own way as you develop relationships, pursue your career and life dreams, and immerse yourself in this amazing game where the possibilities are endless. 
 
Play with your friends, play with life!

name: Super Mario Star Road: The Green Comet
description:
Super Mario Star Road: The Green Comet is a hack released in January 2021, and is based on Super Mario Star Road, another hack of Super Mario 64. It follows Super Mario Galaxy 2's concept of Green Stars, which are placed in tricky locations in already existing levels.

The hack contains 150 Stars, of which 15 can only be accessed after the other 135 have been collected. They replace Star Road's golden stars, are placed in different locations, and are often harder to reach. Enemies and bosses have been removed from levels, and there many more NPCs than the base game. These NPCs give tips to the player or contribute to the game's lore.

All of the game's levels can be accessed right from the start, as doors no longer require Stars or keys.

When 135 Stars have been collected, green coins will appear in every main course, allowing access to the final 15 stars and the true ending of the game.

The game has no life counter, since the player has infinite lives. 1-UP mushrooms are replaced by Comet Medals, which are not required and do nothing but offer an optional challenge to the players who wish to test their skills in platforming, knowledge of the game or observation.

name: Taishou Mebiusline Taizen
description: A Nintendo Switch bundle of Taishou Mebiusline Vitable and the fandisc Taishou Mebiusline Teito Bibouroku Hare in one package.

name: Ye Olde Gunslinger
description: Run n Gun your way through a dungeon in this extremely generic dungeon crawler!

name: Eliminate Drips
description: A brainstorming game relax you.

name: Panmorphia: Enchanted
description: A room escape game set in the magical world of Panmorphia. Wield the four elements and upgrade the amulet!

name: Hundred Chances
description: Challenging 2D Platformer - The Game will test your strength and abiliity ! Can you make your way to the top ?

name: Alien X
description: Alien X - is a hardcore game where you will have to survive playing like a monster Bomber who is on an unknown planet.

name: Oath
description: Take the Oath, overcome the Trials, and discover the truth of the Heart in this original indie RPG.

name: The Last Islands of Man
description: The Last Islands of Man is a retro rpg that forces you to manage your time. The waters are rising. Can you save yourself? Can you save your family?

name: Exotium: Episode 2
description: In this episode the past of Mr. Harris and the man with the headset begins to be revealed, but the objective and the technologies developed of the laboratory are still relatively unclear.

name: Coloring Pixels: Landmarks Pack
description: This Landmarks Book brings 20 new, large images to Coloring Pixels, each image depicts famous landmarks from all over the globe! You can now experience the wonders of the world intimately from your PC!

name: Not An Angels: Erotic Puzzle
description: Not an Angels is a puzzle game with a beautiful graphics, relaxing music and erotic content.

name: Elise's Peepshow
description: Elise has a confession, she likes to be watched! Exhibitionism and voyeurism combine in this erotic adult game, playable on desktop and VR. Take photos, watch the action, or be part of it!

name: Hentai Coloring Game
description: Hentai Coloring Game - Coloring Game. A new coloring game that can win the hearts of players! 10 beautiful arts, 10 hot ladies are waiting for you!

name: Hero by Chance
description: Hero by Chance is a tactical RPG with exciting battles and hot girls. Upgrade your army with many cool unlockables, engage in striking love stories and WIN THIS WAR!

name: X Air Combat
description: The player controls the plane to fight the enemy in the sky, and the perspective of the game is third person.

name: Critters for Sale: Snake
description: An intense psychedelic point-and-click/visual novel following the events that will transpire in 2033 in a club called Limelight. A club with ties to aliens, secret societies, alternate timelines, and a doomsday machine.

name: Bigfoot Forest
description: Bigfoot Forest is a first-person indie horror game. While traveling in your car, you run out of gas and find yourself far away from any civilized locations at night, with only woods and a small town nearby.

name: No Sushi, No Life
description: You’ve arrived at a robot sushi bar with one goal in mind… To eat all the sushi you can. Grab all the sushi coming your way and stuff them in your mouth! Test your reflexes as more and more plates of sushi rush toward you!

name: Resthedex
description: Build some buildings, level up, drive vehicles and enjoy the ride but don't ever forget the protection! When the countdown begins on clocktower, you are going to need to act fast!When the countdown ends you'll face against enemies which will destroy your city unless you take some precautions!

name: Orange Santa
description: Orange Santa is a 2D Christmas-Themed Platform Action game based on the story of Orange Santa who is in-charge of the distribution of the Christmas gifts among the children.

name: Cyber Hentai
description: Cyber Hentai is an action-adventure game set in the city of the future. Androids have gone crazy and you need to deal with it.

name: Hikeshi: Fireman
description: The ultimate immersive animation experience that combines VR, animation, and an Edo-style short story. This immersion into a worldview that makes you feel like you entered the Edo period and are seeing and listening to the story yourself is a sensation akin to playing the lead role in the story.

name: Hike
description: Explore the massive world of unknown and discover the secrets of the wilderness. During your hike a lot of different scenarios happen, for example thunderstorms and such. Hike offers you a relaxing and exploration filled experience. Complete camping related quests in many parts of the magical forests. Soundscape of Hike is designed to be calm and nice for the ears, including background music, natural noises of the forest and more. The length of the game depends on the player. Hike lasts anywhere from half an hour to one and a half depending on the speed of progression. Achievements of Hike are super easy to get by just playing the main storyline even though you still have to pay attention to few things

name: Fire Emblem: Gilmore Girls
description:
Fire Emblem: Gilmore Girls is a ROM hack/mod of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones. It features the characters from the TV show Gilmore Girls.

This mod features:

4 custom maps
multiple playable characters
Depictions of a mother-daughter relationship

name: Endless_Overdrive
description: Lo-Fi High Octane Arcade Action.

name: Oceanhorn: Chronos Dungeon
description: Chronos Dungeon is a dungeon crawler geared towards local multiplayer. Inspired by 16-bit classics, but enhanced with randomized modifiers making each level unique, Chronos Dungeon has players collecting loot and fighting side by side in an epic quest against the god that set the events of the main Oceanhorn saga in motion, Chronos himself.

name: Mambo Wave
description: Mambo Wave — a 2D Platform Shooter which takes place somewhere in Spain in the 90's. Your mission is simple: to advance behind enemy lines, destroying them all with the help of a cool and varied arsenal.

name: Wetware
description: Explore the interplays between AI ethics and consciousness in the shoes of a researcher tasked to hack an enemy drone to win a war.

name: A Little Shop in Squirrel Town
description: "A Little Shop in Squirrel Town" is an RPG-type Simulation Game. You will become the owner of a grocery store in Squirrel Town. Kill monsters and make equipment, Raise pets and fish, make new commodities, and become the richest businessman in Squirrel Town.

name: Teknedia
description: Teknedia is a first person arcade platforming game. Jump your way through dozens of vibrant levels, and unlock the mysteries behind this alien world. Compete against your friends and the world for best times, and seek out hidden, difficult to obtain collectibles.

name: Escape Planet 17
description: Escape Planet 17 is a 2D action cyberpunk platform game where you can Interact with other characters to create unique paths. Use your fighting, shooting, hacking and scanning abilities to solve crimes, defeat your enemies and escape the Planet.

name: Wetware
description: A hacking real time strategy game by Reality Council.

name: Bacon Rebellion
description:
The pigs have gone mad! They are roaming around the countryside, driven by external forces and destroying everything they can lay their eyes on. You thought you were safe.. But no... they're right there.. hundreds.. thousands.. There is no hiding. You can only fight! It's up to you to stop this Bacon Rebellion and save yourself! 
Use your weapons, gain perks and power-ups to stop this rebellion! Save the world from the rebellious pigs in endless gameplay in Survival Mode!

name: Mario Party: Love Land
description: Sin descripción

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Touhou Project Arrangements Pack 5
description: Sin descripción

name: SchoolX
description: Sin descripción

name: Misfortunate Tadpole
description: A cute one-button platform adventure

name: Crumble and Fall
description: A high tempo build and shoot game.

name: Elon's Dream 2
description: A new part of the indie platformer with a side view once again challenges players, this time you will have to cope with a naughty jetpack in conditions of limited visibility, avoid collisions with meteors and spatial holes, and all this, as always, in conditions of limited fuel reserves.

name: Street Football
description: Football game, score goals, for each goal scored, a part of the picture with a beautiful girl will open.

name: The Guardians of Peace
description: The Guardians of Peace is a sci-fi adventure, your goal is to save Hastina-Poora from the corruption of the darkling hordes. This unique society harnesses the seven energies of the universe and uses them in their advanced tech to live in harmony with the rest of the universe.

name: MiniGolf Tour
description: Mini golf, also known as minigolf, mini-putt, or putt-putt, is a sports game in which participants compete by shooting a small ball into special holes with putters. The goal of the game is to cover the allotted distance in the minimum number of strokes. Do you like sports and outdoor activities? Then this golf is perfect for you! Try to complete dozens of challenging levels and show everyone who is the best in minigolf!

name: Escape Sequence
description: Sin descripción

name: Subterene
description: Bore deep below the earth's surface in your all-terrain mining vehicle. Drill for ores, scan for artifacts, and explore an expansive subnautical cavern system.

name: Hell Pages
description: The doors to hell have been opened. The Earth has become a battlefield among 10 infernal armies. Bael, the most feared among all demons, set out in an insane crusade to conquer the Earth for himself in this scrolling shooter game, with 10 stages with plenty of action, violence and blood.

name: Shokuo Shoujo
description: Huntress Yuki and her brother Yuu depend on each other, living in a remote village.

name: Francisca 2
description: Francisca 2 – a first-person indie horror game. Every day you’ll have to survive in your own house. At the start of each level, you need to place video cameras inside the house and in the yard and conceal yourself as well as you can, because a ghost girl is going to visit you soon.

name: Mage Hunters
description: Mage Hunters uses capture and elimination mechanics in the best style of classic board games. You control three Hunters that must eliminate the evil Mages. Each move counts for you complete the mission.

name: Endless Voyage
description: A Roguelike strategy card game. Follow captain Qin, who leads her sailors into a labyrinth of boulders. combine your deck as well as collecting powerful relics to defeat various NPCS and explore this world. Captain, raise your sails and venture forward!

name: Zotrix Starglider
description: Zotrix is an arcade space shooter inspired by early shooter games on arcade machines from 80's and early 90's. Designed for all generations it contains levels with nice and colorful enemies while focuse is on the arcade element of the gameplay. Chains of enemy ships are lining up one by one while you perform maneuvers to clear the perimeter and avoid being cleared out yourself. Victory doesn't come easy as you have to earn every single score point. Each stage consists of 3 waves of enemies where each wave is more challenging. Carve your way towards final battle while you unlock new ships and gain rewards. Special type of gameplay is designed for two player mode. You and your friend are pit against Zotrix aliens to cooperate and find the right balance in the battle to survive and win. - unlock new ships - single player and two player cooperative modes - global leaderboards - collect amazing achievements - nice arcade synthwave music

name: Dakpo
description:
- Totally free, no ads, in-app purchases, just play and have fun 
- Hit the goal with the ball using the obstacles and walls in your favor. 
- 10 shots to complete each stage. 
- No punctuation. No time limit. The only challenge is your skill and your aim. 
- A mix of football and snooker

name: Press Any Button
description: This video game realized how boring it had been and now is trying its best to fix that.

name: Arcade Archives: Rod Land
description: Rod Land was originally an action game released by Jaleco in 1990. Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.

name: Cosmotronik
description: Experience the most intensive, extreme, and brutal selection for the Elite Orbital Guard Forces. Overcome obstacles, show the perfect time, make the right decisions, calculate all possible ways, and most importantly - get alive to the finish in this action-platformer game no matter what.

name: Iron Conflict
description: Fight for glory in Iron Conflict, an online competitive real-time strategy game that features both aircraft and tanks from WWII through today. Make use of military tactics and choose from hundreds of different units to win on the ground and in the air!

name: Machizzle
description: Physics bending VR puzzle game - get your ball to the goal, by obeying the laws of physics. Or bending them to your will.

name: Red Colony
description: Red Colony is a 2D Horror Game filled with drama, mystery, zombies and gore. Help Maria find her daughter and get revenge on her cheating Husband, whilst uncovering the truths of the origins of the virus.

name: Street Cleaner: The Video Game
description:
From the dark streets of San Diego to the deepest depths of the criminal underworld, control the Street Cleaner as he takes down outlaw scum in search of justice. 
 
Street Cleaner is a modern synthwave artist based in San Diego. Inspired by action films of the '80s to write the soundtrack to a vigilante movie that never existed, he has broadened his sound from retro synth inspiration to chiptunes, darksynth, and more. Street Cleaner: The Video Game is the licensed game that would have been made based on that movie, brought to reality.

name: Starship Inspector
description: Starship Inspector is a Space Roguelike in which every choice you make matters. Save a galaxy or rescue your crew member? Serve an evil empire or help an ancient tribe? You'll constantly have to make hard decisions and deal with consequences.

name: Ice Demon
description: How long can you survive? In this arcade-style game, employ hand to hand combat and freeze your enemies to get as many kills as possible before you are defeated.

name: Mare
description:
As you wake up, stirred from a dreamless sleep with an unknown purpose, you find yourself in the strange lands of Mare embodying a mysterious artificial bird.

Crossing paths with a helpless companion you venture deep into unknown territory on a puzzling adventure while unraveling a mysterious narrative and the secrets hidden within. All in order to ensure the arrival of the companion at her impending destiny.

name: 1000 Word Search Puzzles
description:
De-stress with a relaxing word game all to yourself. We’ve added hundreds of non-timed puzzles so the fun never has to end! Improve your vocabulary skills. Thousands of unique words are used in levels. No repeating words.
It starts out very easy but gets challenging quickly. Find hidden words, slide horizontally or vertically your finger over them, and see the letters collapse. Do it for all words and you will be able to clear the grid.
As you get stuck on a level, which you probably will, remember that there are hints to help.

name: Space Runner: Anime
description: Become the legendary Warior in the Space. Play single-player across large exotic maps. Think tactical, be quick against the time and enjoy the adventure!

name: Tears of Luna
description: Danmaku style STG. What is The cause of the Emergency? Why the artifact finally appeared? Travel through time and space,dodge the bullet-hell, defeat the sorceress, and save your own world line!

name: Asteroids Belt: Try to Survive!
description: Asteroids Belt is an arcade game where you have to fly through the asteroid belt in a spaceship, destroying them along the way.

name: Vapor Music Tour
description: This is a tour of Vapor Music’s West Post Production Studio Location in Toronto, Canada.

name: Small Iron
description: Jump and shoot your way across six levels to recover six weapons in your fight against the McCoy gang. Fight against rampaging wildlife in exotic locales across the territory to restore peace and order to the town of Little Brick.

name: Dicey Elementalist
description:
Inspired by a popular dice game called Yahtzee.
- Five dice are rolled three times, keep the best score.

name: Red Falcon
description: A hardcore arcade in retro soviet style. Red Falcon based on a cross between two classic retro games: Invaders and Tetris. Feel the power of soviet technology and destroy non-soviet sectarians heresy, that comes from another universe.

name: Winter Sleigh
description: Do you miss REAL winters with REAL SNOW? Do you want to slide down hills ON A SLEIGH?! Well, who wouldn't! Join the fun in challenging tracks (or make your own) on shiny hills and puffy snowbanks of Winter Sleigh!

name: 无眠夜曲
description: Use assault rifle against the magician! Or use the martial arts to smash the machine armor! Purify your blood, upgrade your skills, bring your favorite characters into the world of reincarnation! Players will operate through mouse or keyboard, adventure in a world of different styles!

name: Stardash
description: Not just the looks of a classic game, also the gameplay of a classic platformer. This game is NOT EASY! you have an endless amount of lives, so you can quickly restart a level when you miss a jump, get hit by an enemy, get bitten by a plant, get hit by a spiky-ball, crushed by big statues, run onto spikes, get hit by a wasp, or any of the other many ways you'll get stopped in your run. BUT when you do complete a level, the rush you get will keep you coming back for more, and more, and more, and.. Unlock special temple levels by finding hidden keys, unlock a flip-mode by completing a level both within the time set, and also by collecting all the coins in a level. Stardash is all about the gameplay thrown at you in awesome retro graphics and original chiptunes.

name: Beholder's Lair
description: Beholder's Lair is a difficult 2D platformer that revolves around skillfully avoiding different kinds of enemies. Learn the movement patterns of your enemies, outsmart them and escape the demons lair!

name: Pretend
description:
Pretend is an arcade game, a clone of Among Us and an adaptation of the classic party games Mafia and Werewolf. It is a game of murder, accusations, deceit, and survival. 
Play with 4-15 players online or via the local network, as you attempt to uncover who pretends to be a worker - by completing tasks and discussing with other co-workers.

name: Ninja Must Die
description: "Ninja Must Die" combines horizontal parkour game horizontal action game. It has carried out a subversive innovation and defined a new game type of "action combat parkour RPG".Beautiful ink painting style, hearty battle duel, brings players a unique cool experience on mobile devices.

name: Two Die
description: Two Die is a turn-based, tactical, roguelike RPG where every action is determined by the roll of two six sided dice. Battle enemies to upgrade your character and discover what hides in your lost memories.

name: Star Mine
description:
Star Mine is a 3D first person perspective space shoot 'em up. Take cargo, blast star jewel's from asteroids and steal energy from alien mines.

Combat the alien ships protecting the mines. Gain access to new parts of the mine with keys. Avoid attractor fields and lightening conductors as well as other hazards within the mines.

Inspired by retro stye space maze games and uses original graphics, music and sound effects

name: Crystal Call
description: Run, dash, blast and slide your way through challenging environments in this fluid and fast paced first person speedrunner!

name: Curse That Magic Cat!
description: Magnus the Wizard has cursed you, turning you into a cat! Lift your curse and take your revenge by meowing, hiding, destroying things, and collecting spell books to break the spell. Curse That Magic Cat! is a lighthearted, single-player game made by students at SMU Guildhall.

name: Actor Tycoon 2
description: Build your own talent agency in Actor Tycoon 2 and conquer Hollywood in this tycoon/management game! Make stars out of unknown actors, mingle with celebrities, manage your network of connections and win prestigious awards to become the most recognized agent in the film industry!

name: Save daddy trump 2: The Final Triumph
description: Daddy Trump is kidnapped again and now locked to container. You Kiki Trump are only hope. Destroy Peaceland country enemies and their leader Corrupt.

name: Ralf's Adventure: Aztec Mystery
description:
In this retro-styled game, you will navigate labyrinthine temples, finding relics that will prove critical to solving the ancient puzzles.

As with any ancient temple, there are traps aplenty, and you must keep your wits about if you wish to have any hope of finding your Mother!

Descend through 8 different temples, fighting Guardians, and collecting their golden idols to open the way to Mictlantecuhtli's deepest lair.

name: SCP: Escape Together
description: An SCP game centered around making it out alive with your friends.

name: Døm Rusalok
description: Russia in the ‘90s. A provincial town at the edge of the crumbling Soviet Empire. A group of kids faces the disturbing horror they are unable to comprehend – the Døm Rusalok. This is a place where the worst nightmares come true.

name: Guilty Parade
description: One war. Two sides of a military conflict. What will you choose if you take a look at the world from two sides of the barricades? Whom will you support and whom will destroy if some are fighting for an uncertain future, while others are for a peaceful present?

name: Merchant Life
description:
You've been summoned to another world.
What was waiting for you there was a harsh merchant life ...

name: Champoo Club
description: Champoo Club is a challenging action game with arena fighting, involving sword, missile and cute characters.

name: Bikini Island Challenge
description: The girls of Bikini Island are eager to fulfill your wildest fantasies. All you have to do is survive the island. Battle your way through the treacherous environment, man-eating tigers, and savage natives to save the girls and unlock their unique pleasuring powers.

name: Trump vs. Covid: Save the World Clicker
description: Save the world from COVID with nukes!

name: Sakura Mochi
description: Sakura Mochi is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Abandoned Life
description: Abandoned Life is a third-person zombie shooter game, where you can complete missions with the help of companions.

name: Dura Vita Online
description: Dura Vita Online is a multiplayer RPG in a medieval fantasy setting. You are an ordinary citizen living your life when The Occurrence happens. Now evil has started to spread across the land and you have no choice but to take up arms and destroy it!

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Variety Pack XXL
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Tales From Yeoldeburg
description: Tales From Yeoldeburg is a simple 2D RPG game featuring fun action packed segments including, Battle, Resilience, Tasks, Adventure, Exploration and more!

name: Arc Wizards 3
description: The war of the wizards begins! This is an exciting action game with a 16-bit taste!

name: Shopping Empire Tycoon
description: This Game is Basically a Market Management Simulator. Make Your Store Get The Best Profit With Various Upgrades and Unlocks. Including Basic Clicking stuff, Managing Your Own Market , Upgrading and A game with the theme of reaching to going to next level.

name: Amazing Joes Journey
description: Amazing Joe's Journey is a simple point & click browser game. A main character is Joe who landed in forest on his flying carpet and wants to find a treasure. It's placed at an island and Joe needs a boat.

name: The Fang
description: A daring wanderer wields his weapons in real-time battles through his quest into the unknown.

name: The Penguin IQ Test
description: Are you intelligent enough to save the penguin? Help him get back to the ice floe. This test will measure your IQ and give you a result between 0 and 180.

name: L'a L'a Cofflhu Fhtagnyaa
description: L'a L'a Cofflhu Fhtagnyaa is a Galgame with Cthulhu mythology, with three female (xie) masters (shen) who can be attacked, 8-10 hours of game time. Working in a coffee shop, I accidentally discovered the indescribable secret of this shop...

name: Dominate Square
description: 4つの属性を的確に配置し、相手の駒を奪いましょう。

name: Yeminj
description: Yeminj is an score chasing arcade game, kill thousands of enemy's on a small arena using your sword and magic, cashing in on gems on burst to increase your power facing infinitelly harder waves, competing for the top place on the leaderboard, do you have what it takes?

name: Orion: The Eternal Punishment
description: Orion is a frantic first person shooter where you fight the void creatures in mysterious planets and advance using your special abilities and gadgets.

name: Avrod
description: A virtual reality archaeology free-to-play online social platform.

name: Choices That Matter: And Their Souls Were Eaten
description: And Their Souls Were Eaten You have a gift. With your gift, the dead are never truly gone. But what if there is a dark side to your gift? What if there are those who can pervert your talent, and alter the balance of life and death? Travel across a steampunk 1830s Europe, where metal is magical, giving powers to those who wear it. Learn more about your ancient gift and what it means for you, your family, and humanity. Uncover the nefarious plot to destroy all life... and fight against time to stop your enemy from destroying everything you hold dear. Choices That Matter is a collection of epic text adventure games similar to the classic Choose Your Path Adventure books. Our interactive stories are some of the most complex in the this category. No one player can discover the entire story in a single play through!

name: Wolf Tales: Online RPG Sim
description: Play as a wolf in a variety of natural habitats. Hunt for food and survival.

name: Super Mario Bros. Peach's Adventure
description: Super Mario Bros. Peach's Adventure (a ROM hack of Super Mario World) is a full scale adventure, with 8 main Worlds, a special 9th World, and tons of secrets and post-game content! Almost every level has 5 Star Coins to collect, as well!

name: Nerts!: Online
description:
NERTS! Online is a fast-paced competitive solitaire game for you and up to five of your friends, played the same way we play it at the Zachtronics office!

Nerts is a competitive solitaire variant that is known by multiple other names, outlined as far back as the 1930s. with slight differences in official rules.
The game is a mix of solitaire and speed where any aces found can be used by all players with the goal of clearing their target/Nerts pile first.

name: Soulestination
description:
"Soulestination" is a magic tower (fixed-value strategy RPG) game that incorporates meta elements. Players need to control Rovia as the Savior, fight the enemy in the process of exploring the world, and gradually see the essence of the world. 
 
· More than 300 well-designed maps, more than 20 different styles of areas 
· Revealing the essence of the world as you explore further 
· More than 200 enemies, with dozens of different skills. You need to organize strategies for each enemy with unique skills 
· Nearly 30 unique Evil Soul bosses, which require a certain strategy to reduce the damage taken in defeating them. 
· Dozens of unique Weapons and Soul Artifacts. There are countless ways to beat the game. 
· 3 modes of difficulty are carefully balanced, allowing both casual players and hardcore players to enjoy the strategy of this game. 
· Playtime of more than 10 hours. It will surely bring you a strategic feast.

name: Hexagon Puzzle
description: Hexagon puzzle has the challenge of moving colored hexagons to the spaces of the same color by clicking on them.

name: Open Sorcery: Sea++
description: You wake up at the bottom of a dark ocean, surrounded by your broken dreams.

name: We got bored lol
description: Six small ~2-hour speedmaps + a start hub, all following different themes and based on the Copper mod (included). It comes with a custom music track.

name: Final Fantasy Renaissance
description:
A fangame tribute to the original Final Fantasy game released by Square on the NES. There are currently two distinct game modes in FFR. “Classic Mode” and “Renaissance Mode”.
Classic Mode is intended as a faithful recreation of the original Final Fantasy gam, but with all known bugs fixed.
Renaissance Mode is the same core game as Classic Mode, but with a number of new job classes available to choose from, as well as new game mechanics added. The new job classes are all based on job classes introduced in later games in the Final Fantasy series (such as Evoker, Lancer, Blue Mage, and many more).

name: Adult World 3D
description: A web-based computer sex simulation game, featuring highly customizable interactive 3D scenes.

name: OverKart 64
description:
OverKart 64 is a rom hack for Mario Kart 64 that provides new custom levels as well as several new features to enhance the original game. It is compatible with the Nintendo 64 hardware, provided a user has inserted the Expansion Pak.
New Game Modes:

- "Red Coin Mode" where there are 8 red coins to be found and collected on each custom level.

- "Practice Mode" which allows users to more easily practice the game with toggles on the D-Pad and L button such as save states and timers.

- "Flycam" where you can control a free-floating camera that can navigate any of the original or custom levels.

As well as other options such as AI Bots, new racer stats, input display and much more.

The latest update (titled OverKart 4 DLC Pak) brings the number of custom levels to 24!

name: A Bike Ride to the Creek
description: I lived in rural North Carolina during my elementary school years, and loved to explore the forests, ponds, and trails that surrounded my neighborhood. These places are all but gone now due to encroaching development, so making a game that retraces the trail to the creek has been a way for me to preserve and revisit some really happy childhood memories.

name: Tales Up
description:
Tales Up is a cooperative role-playing game, a blend of board game and interactive stories such as “choose your own adventure” books.

You’ll find zombies, pirates, vikings… Hijinks and surprises will ensue!

name: Digital Seclusion
description: Isolated in a room repurposed into a personal shrine to esoteric Japanese media. Our nameless protagonist has dedicated himself to a collection of retro Japanese computer games, with a particular fondness for early visual novels. Although decaying in a slovenly existence to the untrained eye, his retreat into digital life is enriched by the scripted interactions with various charming 2D girls. His one purpose in life is to chronicle his thoughts and reflections on each of the digital worlds he immerses himself in. However, one day while pulling out the box of another visual novel to review, a girl leaps straight out of the cover art and begins interacting with him face to face. And perhaps most shocking of all to him, in a completely unscripted manner.

name: Mending Wall
description: A game inspired by a poem, and intended for two players—but playable solo.

name: Super Mumtaz Bros.
description: In Super Mumtaz Bros. you join the titular plumbing brothers on their mission to rescue Princess Sana from... chickens?

name: Colorful Mirai
description: A VN about a girl going through an art block in the most important moment of her life.

name: Binary Quest
description: Save the world, one YES/NO at a time.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask - Masked Quest
description: This is the second phase of Garo-Mastah's modifications of the game, with many changes in the gameplay, altering many known locations.

name: Blaze
description: Blaze is a 3rd person over the shoulder action adventure game where you a budding fire elemental seek to cleanse your fellow elementals from the corruption of humanity.

name: Madden NFL 21: Superstar Edition
description:
Madden NFL 21 Superstar Edition includes Lamar Jackson, Patrick Mahomes, and Shaun Alexander in Madden Ultimate Team.

Madden NFL 21 delivers new features and modes including:

•Face Of The Franchise: Rise To Fame | Push the limits and rise to Hall of Fame immortality.

•New Gameplay Mechanics

•The Yard | A brand new backyard football mode

name: Twinstick Classics Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Fairytale Mosaics: Cinderella 2
description: Explore amazing worlds! Let your imagination roam free! Hurry and get to the ball before the wicked sisters!

name: Mutant Football League: Terror Bay Mutantneers
description: Terror Bay Mutantneers DLC includes Terror Bay Mutantneers team, theme song and its arena.This content requires the base game Mutant Football League in order to play.

name: Fly the Cloud
description: Ride on a cloud, fly freely in the sky. Just stand on the cloud and you can control it by changing your position. dodging various obstacles, reach the goal in limited time. Support up to 4 local players racing in splict screen mode.

name: Aliens Adventure
description: Aliens Adventure is a super classic adventure game with legendary side-scrolling arcade platformer. Jump and shoot your way to freedom as you search for your fellow Aliens and break free from captivity. Enjoy this brand new super adventure platformer game!

name: Bridg
description: Bridge walking simulator

name: Espacio Cosmic Light-Seeker
description: This space is full of magical characters too! Enjoy the monochrome worldview with cute space animals. What is the true nature of this space? What awaits you in search of the light! The appearance of your buddy Celluar is customizable! There are also various item books, so try to complete them!

name: Virtual Battle
description: Virtual Battle is an action game you can easily pick up and start playing! Defeat enemies with a range of weapons and gimmicks in four themed virtual worlds. Defeat a slew of enemies in Cyber World, Monochrome World, Rainbow World, and Real World, to be the last one standing!

name: Top Gun Air Combat
description: Nato armies are engaged in a 21th century conflict against Russian Federation Army. As a Top Gun Pilot from US Air Force, you fly the best American Fighters (F18, F35, F22...) through multiple missions across battlefields around the world (Cuba, Lebanon, Ukraine...) in cooperation with your European Allies Aircrafts (Typhoon, Rafale, Mirage...). You will be engaged in air combat against Russian Fighters (Mig 27, Mig 33, Su 37...). Lock your targets, choose amongst different missile systems and riffle, shoot and forget! Powered by a very realistic physic engine that makes the game highly playable, Top Gun Air Combat will make you feel real sensations of modern air combat.

name: Theseus
description:
Theseus never killed the Minotaur. He found common cause with Asterion, until he didn't anymore. A tale of diaspora, gender, and survival. 
 
"Theseus" is a surrealist narrative game about helping a messy Athenian prince break up with his Minotaur love of five years. Navigate a physical labyrinth of all his internalized self-doubt in this narrative adventure! Playtime is around the length of a movie, and is meant to be consumed in a single sitting.

name: IndestructoTank!
description: A Game Boy port of the first Indestructotank game including features from the game Indestruc2tank!.

name: Puzzle Pieces
description: Puzzle Pieces is easy to learn but hard to master game that will put both your reflexes and perception to test! Your goal is to match as many puzzles as possible and in the begining it's easy but with every succesfull match the difficulty increases and with it the speed of the game.

name: Shining Maiden
description:
Girls with the power from ancient scientific civilization,
and the tough journeys the girls must go through.
The fate of the girls are on your hands!

name: Drool of the Killer
description:
An empty bus moves through the town. Beneath the tiles of the swimming pool complex, a new world is striving to be born. This is the TAMMY show, coming soon to a city near you. But can BB escape it in time, or has she already gotten out of her depth?

A short cartoon mystery/horror game with no jumpscares. Made with Unity and Doodle Studio 95. Soundtrack by Tommy Tone. Mystery television by A. Degen. Water effects plugin by pure evil studio.

name: Room Containing Candle x4
description: Sin descripción

name: Return Tape
description: Return Tape is a short but relaxing simulator game.

name: Kill Fish
description: Experience the surreal and captivating world of Kill Fish, a 2D side-scroller platformer that takes you on a journey through a mysterious and oppressive environment. With hand-drawn graphics, a mystical storyline, and challenging gameplay, it's an unforgettable gaming experience.

name: N-Body
description: A relaxing golf game in space. Launch stars in different solar systems with relaxing soundscapes and slowly form constellations.

name: Villa's Blinds
description: Hello graduates! You have a degree on computer engineering and you can’t find a job? Start now to develop a game in your rental garage. Advertise them and gather your own fan base. Earn your pocket money! Of course, you won’t live in this garbage dump till the end!

name: Hexahedral Pathfinder
description: Taking a twist on the classic box pushers, this simple yet deceivingly challenging puzzler will push the limits of your imagination, as you control the blocks in unison through Contains over 150 patiently handcrafted levels and 50 additional challenge levels for those confident in their skills. Features the full use of 3D space, portals, colour changers, explosions, doors and sensors, and much more!

name: Fairytale Mosaics: Beauty and the Beast 2
description: Solve 120 enchanted mosaics! Bring the prince and kingdom back to normal before the final enchanted rose petal falls!

name: Murder by Candlelight
description: You're a detective on the case. An old rich man was killed during dinner time, and no one knows how. The wife, maid, and chef all say they were eating dinner together when it happened. No one got up, so how did this man end up dead?

name: One Week at Freddy's
description: One Week at Freddy's is a joke fnaf fangame based on Five nights at Freddy's 2 + Doom II by mrbenio.

name: BattleCross
description: Unique fast-paced card battle where each players takes turn controlling the shuttlecock's position and speed with cards, until one side fail to receive. The basic concept of the card battle is simple enough to understand without prior badminton knowledge, but deep enough to provide challenge for anyone who loves CCG and deck building card games.

name: Enceladus
description: Doom1 episode which runs on E4 with new textures based on already existing patches and custom monster behaviour via DEHACKED

name: As usual.
description:
"Today, as usual."

This is a linear atmospheric game.
There are no loud scares, so please use headphones!
Some grotesque imagery is present, if it's not to your liking please refrain from playing.

name: Destinata: Full Red Edition
description: A fast platformer and visual novel branched game with unique style art, where nothing but time will prevail. The more the game advance the better it develops.

name: 27 Pages
description: A simple and short 2d plataform with a dark history behind

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Inzer - South Ural Mountains
description: A beautiful replica of the railways of central Eurasia, in the Ural mountain range.

name: Wacky Run
description: Wacky Run is a cool and fun arcade game where you need to race against other people and acquire floorboards to use them for shortcuts. Every level is randomly generated, so you really need to use your wits and your tactics in order to win.

name: Maze with cube
description: Maze with cube is a fun puzzle game where you need to guide your cube as you try to find the end of the maze. There are more than 100 levels to play through, each one with its own maze and unique gameplay challenges. You will need to test all your puzzle skills as you try to complete challenges and reach the next experience. As you play, you will become better and better at puzzle games. Every new puzzle adds a higher level of difficulty, but it all increases gradually. So there’s a lot of fun to be had and a variety of exciting experiences for you to enjoy. All you have to do is to check out Maze with cube today! Features: Great puzzle game experience Guide the cube to the end of the maze More than 100 levels to play through Simplistic, minimalist graphics

name: Fall Balance Ball
description:
Indie platformer in a 3D setting.
Balance on platforms, jump and pass barriers. Collected crystals will give you super powers.

name: Saving Grace
description: Stop hell from ascending to earth. Save your daughter... Before it's too late.

name: Meteor Missiles
description: Small game inspired by flappy birds physics and endless horizontal scroller games, it will get more difficult the more you progress.

name: Power's Out
description: A small memory for the Candles Bitsy Jam.

name: Light, Wax, Shadow, Wick
description: A ritualistic candle-based personality test.

name: Crown Clicker
description: Crown Clicker is a clicker game with simple functions. Just click and have fun! we plan to add more updates, and would love constructive criticism.

name: Shell Out
description: A shell hack with only 1 exit.

name: Pikmin 2: Unconventional Bosses
description: Sin descripción

name: Durka Simulator
description: Durka Simulator is a visual novel where you are waiting for adventure and mystery.You as the main player are being sought to take away your power.You and mysterious must not let them catch you!With you will always be your friends as a lemur named Zina, Mysterious and Larry

name: Gura Tambourine
description: Gawr Gura / Hololive rhythm fangame

name: Rayman 4 You
description:
Relive your experiences in the colorful world of Rayman. Jump around platforms, defeat enemies and most important of all, find Globox!

Rayman belongs to Michel Ancel and Ubisoft Montpellier and this game is not made with lucrative intentions. It's a game for the fans by a huge fan of the Rayman saga.

name: Zombie Alert
description: Zombie Alert is a survival game. Survive by hunting zombies, build your own territory, capture cities and collect items - whether alone or with your friends!

name: The Worst Game Ever
description: Utilize just a grappling hook and wall jumping to adventure through a near-to-impossible parkour maze. With no checkpoints and lava floor, your every move counts because once you touch the lava, you restart at the beginning. Challenge yourself by making the game even worse with hardcore controls.

name: Quest for Runia
description: Quest for Runia is a relaxing VR puzzle game. You have to break 3D structures by combining at least three cubes of the same color. Try to figure out the most effective way to finish each level.

name: Racing Djani 2
description: Racing Djani 2 is a racing genre game. It consists of 150 levels with 6 amazing different themes. It is a 2D game with 30 new cars and different backgrounds Candy, Lava, Jungle, and Ancient. Test your skills that how fast you run away, you will earn more and more by covering distances, and you can unlock new cars!

name: Dream Drifters
description:
You've entered a deep dream taking you into the Dreamscape and infinite realm for you to explore. As you drift you'll encounter Nightmares that will try to end your dreams so be sure to dodge them. How deep can you travel?

In this casual infinite runner, you'll drift through an infinite path and dodge incoming enemies. Take a step back from being awake and drift for a while.

name: Bad Boy Simulator
description: This time, mom will not be called to school! Feel like a school bully and piss off the teacher! Use different items and do stuff in the classroom. Careful - the teacher is very vigilant!

name: Some Peace of Mind
description:
You wake up in the middle of the night and you find yourself in your room, but everything feels out of place. It seems like your brother locked your computer, messed with your stuff and left clues all around to help you decrypt the password. But why would he do that? And why does your room seems so weird?

Features:
* Inventory and logic based puzzles
* A room full of objects to interact with
* Over 150 scenes, comprising of real photographs carefully shot and retouched to provide a fluid gaming experience
* Over 100 sound effects, plus ambient sounds and original music
* A 90’s classic, 2d first person navigation system with multitouch support
* An enticing story, with or without a plot twist
* Made almost entirely by a single developer (can’t get much more indie than that)

Some Peace Of Mind is a remastered version of the same-titled game released back in 2011 exclusively for PCs, before “escape rooms” were cool. This version was built from the ground up for iPad & iPhone and features many enhancements, including a new story, new ending, new puzzles, new scenes, new inventory items, new music etc.

name: Tritris
description: Tritris is a Tetris variant played with isosceles right triangles on a rectangular grid.

name: Mixx Island: Remix
description:
Mixx Island: Remix is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty! 
This beautiful place was built only for simple fun! Choose the character and difficulty level that best suits you and enjoy a short, simple but colorful boss rush minigame!

name: Zoo Keeper
description: This is a Homebrew port of the original Zoo Keeper from the arcade for the Atari 2600 by Champ Games.

name: Cubecat
description: Sin descripción

name: Legend of John: Lingering Blood
description:
This project hack is short comedy/epic that will be a prequel to John’s true journey as a legendary hero.
Story is just comedy mostly but there is hints of the themes and TRUE STORY TO COME!!!

name: Knight Guy in Low Res World: Castle Days
description: Knight Guy in Low Res World: Castle Days is a platformer with some metroidvania elements. Knight Guy's pet (either a dog or a cat) has been kidnapped by an evil dragon, and he has to explore a castle with 100 rooms in order to find and rescue his pet. He must do this within a one hour time limit, all while dealing with the evil dragon and his minions.

name: Minesweeper
description: A minesweeper homebrew for the ColecoVision.

name: Repair Plane
description: Repair broken pieces and install new one if necessary to get ready for the fly! Enjoy repairing cargo plane, business jet, fighter, jet, helicopter and many aircrafts..

name: Another World
description: A port of Another World game engine & assets to PICO-8.

name: Bloxd.io
description: It is a multiplayer sandbox game where you can build, explore, and compete in voxel worlds. Play with Friends in mini-games such as bedwars, skywars and more or unleash your creativity by designing your worlds.

name: Clandestine Castle Crashing
description: Forsooth! For ye knights of Speed of ye Pineapple Under the Sea hath created yet another bountiful megaWAD secreted with many hidden items for thoust've to explore and gather as ye Crash thee Castles Clandestine!

name: Atlas Earth: Buy Virtual Land
description: Atlas: Earth is a location-based app where users can buy virtual land that mirrors real-world locations, 900 square feet at a time. Purchase land anywhere near your physical location in the real world and it’s yours to keep!

name: Let's Get Happy Ending Project Chapter 1 Yume Nikki Time to Wake Up
description: Let's Get Happy Ending Project Chapter 1 Yume Nikki Time to Wake Up is a non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Madotsuki as she tries to avoid her canonical end by gathering NPCs in the dream world.

name: Sonic CD 2011 Decompilation
description: A decompilaton of Sonic CD (the 2011 remaster version, using the mobile version as a basis) for computers. This mod adds a built-in mod loader and technical improvements over the officially released version of the remaster for PC.

name: Brutal Wolfenstein: Uber Hero Edition
description:
This is the Brutal Wolfenstein's fan-made fork.
it's based on Brutal Wolfenstein Version 4.5.
This mod's concept is brings Amazing MachineGames Wolfenstein stuffs(Wolfenstein: The New Order, The Old Blood, The New Colossus, Youngblood) to Brutal Wolfenstein.

Also, gives some enhance to Brutal Wolfenstein to be more cool.

name: Fallen London: Caveat Emptor
description: Addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for January, 2021

name: The Reggae Operation
description: The Reggae Operation is a short four stage Mega Man fangame. Fly with Reggae through four stages of arcade action, defeating complex bosses and using unique weapons! And please, read the readme.

name: Three Lesbians in a Winter Special
description: Trixie spends Snowmas with her friends. Lesbianism ensues.

name: NFUT Cards
description: A play to earn football manager video game where the main assets are football collectibles in the form of NFT's, developed in the Binance Smart Chain.

name: Revv Racing
description: REVV Racing is an arcade simulation car racing blockchain game developed by Animoca Brands. It is the newest play-to-earn title in the REVV Motorsport metaverse of racing games.

name: Exotium: Episode 1
description: In 2082, the human species lives in peace, and its technological and societal evolutions are exponential.

name: Find the Invisible Cow
description: A game where you find invisible animals.

name: Gravity Brawl
description: Gravity Brawl is a 2d multiplayer shooter in zero gravity with tons of unique characters, wacky weapons, and power-ups. Shoot everything in sight while celebrating wins with your friends on team mode or solo play in 1 on 1 matches in a set of playable arenas to fly through. Shoot and you shall fly away, pushed back by your weapon backfire, drifting in the zero gravity arena where other brawlers are just waiting for your kill shot.

name: Sunflower Code
description: "Sunflower Code", which uses more than 50 paintings by Van Gogh, is a first-person perspective mystery-solving horror. Cryptography based on the basics of modern cryptography hinders the progress of the main character. You may be able to experience Van Gogh's paintings and their worldview.

name: Timewalk Tower Defense
description: An asymmetric Tower Defense/Third Person Shooter

name: Into the Pyramid
description: Into the Pyramid is the new multiplayer game from Aisukaze Studio, be part of the team trying to scape from the pyramid or sabotage the mission for your own interests.

name: Pokémon Pathways
description: For Generations, Pokémon has been a game where you get your starter from the professor, catch wild Pokémon, Beat the gym leaders, defeat the elite 4 and inevitably become Champion. Maybe you even get a legendary or two during your journey. All of this is known as the typical Pokémon game format. Today, I bring you something different.. Unique, so to speak.

name: Rainbow Sea
description: Rainbow Sea is a somewhat disquieting pixel-arts adventure with attractive character designs of the Seven Lucky Gods. There are more than 100 different events and 22 endings.

name: Der Blaue Diamant
description: "The Blue Diamond" is about a group of children playing a game in which one can experience a few adventures. The player comes to town as a new kid and has to help his new friends to win the game.

name: Domain
description: Domain is a free to play, strategy based TCG. With cut throat battles and endless exploration of strategy, no two Domain games are ever the same. Domain champions smart gameplay and tactics, the skill of the player is more important than the deck that they hold. Think you’ve got what it takes to enter the domains?

name: Speed Truck Racing
description: In Speed Truck Racing you'll enjoy the dirtiest, fastest, and most spectacular races at speeds over 150 Mp/h, avoiding multiple collisions against 10 adversaries. The game has different modes, such as Championship, Arcade, and 4-player multiplayer. Online ranking chart where you can compare your best times with friends and players from all over the world.

name: Hitori Logic
description: Hitori Logic is played with a grid of squares or cells, with each cell initially containing a number. The game is played by eliminating squares/numbers and this is done by marking them red. The objective is to transform the grid to a state wherein all three following rules are true: 1) no row or column can have more than one occurrence of any given number 2) red cells cannot be adjacent, although they can be diagonal to one another. 3) the remaining numbered cells must be all connected to each other, horizontally or vertically. > 90 easy/medium/hard levels, challenge for everyone > Beautiful background art > Hours of brain-teasing puzzles

name: Rubber Ducky Massacre
description: A procedurally-generated endless 2D shooter, with a specific hatred towards rubber ducks.

name: Parkour Master
description: Parkour Master is a 3D platformer emulating a free-running environment. Players are challenged to complete eight levels and a tutorial as fast as possible, competing the in Parkour Masters tournament.

name: GeoQuiz
description: How many countries can you name? As you answer, the map will be filled in. You have 15 minutes. Play solo or online, in English, Spanish or French. It's free and ad-free ❤️

name: Really Boring Website
description: An online word game similar to Scattergories.

name: Narrowboat Simulator
description:
Narrowboat Simulator a simulation with some game aspects. You control one of Britain's typical narrowboats in a 3D environment.  
 
During the game you'll have to perform some simple tasks. To advance you'll have to collect "Canal Karma" by displaying your navigating skills. Speeding and behaving like having a ride on the dodgems is considered as bad karma and will reduce your score.  
  
Having completed the tasks with a high enough score will allow you to cruise freely.

name: Quarantine Diary
description:
Quarantine Diary is the 16th game in the Carol Reed series.
The game is 100% mouse driven and features a classic adventure game interface.
The game contains no graphic violence or any swearing. It has no action elements, and is suitable for ages 15 and up.

name: Epic City Builder 4
description: In Epic City Builder 4 you build a whole nation across multiple maps. Pass laws at the national level. Fiddle with the budgets at the city level. Manage your taxes and spending well and later you could be laying out whole cities at once.

name: Frontline: World War II
description: In this Table-top WWII Hex-strategy game, you get to lead your army to victory by conquering objectives in any strategy you find best.

name: Unoccupied
description: Unoccupied is a first-person action game with procedurally generated environment, challenging gameplay and intelligent bots.

name: Diving City
description: Diving City is an action RPG with strategy elements, featuring Karl, who has been trapped in Luvania, an underground megacity built by a mysterious civilisation, for reasons unknown. Karl will have to collect elemental cubes from the surroundings and create makeshift traps to unlock the way forward

name: Floating Point Leviathan
description: A whale. A harpoon. A world on the edge of sane numbers.

name: Tough Love Arena
description: Tough Love Arena is a web-based, indie fighting game with rollback netcode that's 100% free to play.

name: Heeey! Park-Boy
description: Heeey! Park-Boy is a casual simulation/adventure game heavily inspired by early 2000s era PS2/Gamecube titles like Chibi-Robo and Katamari Damacy.

name: The Curse of Illmore Bay
description:
Illmoore is a platforming adventure game that takes you through several areas of Illmoore Bay. The level themes are the town, swamp, haunted house, cemetery, asylum, and a mall. You'll also acquire power-ups as you progress through the game, and you can find keys to unlock even more power-ups!

Come join us on this horror/cartoon inspired action platforming adventure!

name: RoboSquare
description: Jump into speedy hazard-packed Robo battles with up to 15 other players where random series of synchronized events destroy the fighting arena. Everyone zooms around the level bumping, drifting, and flipping to become the ultimate winner by being the last one to standing in an ongoing stage of madness. Join a sumo-inspired experience with a rush of energetic motor buzz where even the hardest hits and coolest tricks might not save you from the mayhem on the screen.

name: Dragonborne
description:
Get ready for a brand new adventure RPG on Game Boy, Indie Developer SpaceBot Interactive brings you the eagerly awaited Dragonborne.

Travel through the region of Argon as Kris, in search of your missing father Kurtis, the greatest dragon slayer the region has ever known.

Dragonborne is made with GB Studio and features a turn based battle system, various mini quests and puzzles that you must complete to progress through the game.

Fight your way to each of the dragon caves to face your fears and overcome the challenges that stand in your way.

Are you tough enough to find your father and save the region before the dragon's awake from their slumber?

6-7 hours of gameplay, puzzles, dungeons, multiple enemies, various weapon and armour upgrades, character zapping system, ranking system dependent on how you finish the game, various collectibles, mini quests, multiple endings and much more!!​

name: Black Border Patrol Simulator
description: Black Border is a border cop simulator game that simulates the life of a real border patrol officer. In this game, you assume the role of a police officer of the border present at the entry and exit gates of the country you work and live in. You the player is supposed to check the passengers' papers and stop the smuggling of illegal items and bribery.

name: Groupthink
description: Groupthink is a party game about working together with your teammates to come up with silly answers - One letter at a time!

name: Slime LOL
description: Grab some slippery pals and hop in to this quirky online multiplayer arena. Thousands of possible outfits. Upgrades, Ranks, and Real-time physics. What are you waiting for? Slime on!

name: Unknown Surge
description: First MMO FPS Game from Bangladesh

name: Iron Armada
description: Iron Armada is a multiplayer, space-faring combat game where players must team up to build a fleet of ships in order to survive the perils of space and defeat the opposing player faction. Build ships of all shapes and sizes, mine resources, and scavenge parts with friends to conquer the universe!

name: Sonic Pinball Panic!
description: Sin descripción

name: Sol Rush Misadventure
description:
Sol Rush Misadventure is a visual novel about Blaze and Marine going on a treasure hunt on the quest to find the Achlysolis Blade, an ancient treasure hidden for generations.

As Blaze and Marine go together solving various puzzles on their quest, they also build a closer bond to each other. Could this treasure have some link to Blaze's path? Can Marine convince Blaze about the thrill of adventure?

name: Sonic Legends: True Sunset Shore
description: Sin descripción

name: Find the Pairs
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Slug SB Fanthology
description:
Metal Slug SB Fanthology is a fan game developed by SuperBlinky, which has been in development since 2020. The latest version of the project is 0.7.2.

The main goal of the project is to create 8 new Metal Slug experiences based on the 8 mainline games, while also providing a 4-Player Co-op and a new VS. mode.

name: Cigar Break
description: A short narrative about smoking in your backyard. Made in 48 hours for HPS1 Wretched Weekend Jam 1.

name: Conquistador
description: You came to this new land wanting fortune, now, in this cursed forest, you will have to survive against it's dangers, be them natural or not. Entry for the GameJam "A Game By Its Cover 2020". Inspired by the fictional cartridge "Conquistador" made by Jenn Mima.

name: Gandhi III
description:
The city is in danger from a new class of scum, with the streets in chaos and threatened with a nuclear attack the police have their hands tied, now only one man can clean the trash, a one man wrecking crew, the atomic pacifier, in this summer comes the most action packed movie game sequel of the sequel... Gandhi III!

Inspired by Weird Al's skit "Gandhi II" from the movie "UHF". In no way we own the rights to the movie "UHF", this is only a free fan game inspired by a segment in the movie. This game was made for entertainment, parody and pastiche purposes, and is transformative in nature.

name: Night Feed
description:
From the depths of the 1920’s comes this summer’s most petrifying tale! Come and see the story of a man lost in the jagged streets of a cursed city and feel the dread of being preyed by an unknown beast! “There are hidden things that roam the dark corners of this city, I pray for a safe return to my wife. May God have me if not.” Will he come back home to his wife after a high-class feast? Or will he succumb to the darkness that awaits him in the night? Only your blood will know the answer…

Inspired by “The Cabinet of Dr.Caligari” and other silent movies. Our submission for the Haunted PS1 Summers Of Screams Jam.

name: Assessment
description: Now that the study period is over, please download your personalized assessment to complete your program. Please be advised the Stillman Personal Assessment System may have some incomplete cognitive features at the time of download. Please refrain from reporting any errors you may encounter.

name: Moe's Body Shop
description: Horrible visions of a destroyed building come rushing to you night after night. At first you wrote them off as bad dreams, night terrors, but now a voice calls out to you "COME AND SEE". You can't ignore it any more. You have to go to Moe's Body Shop.

name: The Last Utopi
description: Years ago, after the alien plant spores ravaged the Earth, we piled onto spaceships and left. A new planet. A new culture. A new beginning. But when Eli Mason, the enigmatic founder and CEO of The Colony, asks you to travel back to Earth to find out exactly how the alien invasion began, you have a duty to go. It's time to go back to Utopi, the Swedish furniture store where the spores began to spread. You don't know what's left of your world. You don't know what you might find. But it's calling you.

name: Heresy
description: In Heresy (or: The Impossible Task of Herman the Recluse), your task is simple. You must produce a tome of sufficient quality before dawn, or you will be sentenced to an arduous death by starvation by way of immurement - you will be walled in alive. Can you make it in time? Or will you need help from the dark beyond?

name: Integrated
description:
Roxanne is out there to find a job on what seems to be a normal office. However, sooner than later she will find herself in a place she is not supposed to be...

A game made for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Screams Jam by @PhantomaDev and @MiaRevello in 45 days.

name: The Helping Hand Paradox
description: "The Helping Hand Paradox" is a short horror-puzzle randomize game that has many ways to solve the main puzzle and 2 endings. It was made for the 48-hours "Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend 1" jam.

name: Legends of Cobalt Lake & District
description: Legends of Cobalt Lake & District is a short point-and-click horror game where players uncover the mystery surrounding the disappearance of disgraced academic and recluse Amber Gillies. The game itself is pretty simple, but if you run into any problems, don't hesitate to ask questions in the comments!

name: Farm House Night
description:
Short interactive based on "Boba" Folk horror sleep paralysis demon from Bengal.
You're a worker on a farm, helping your boss and tasks.

name: September 1998
description: Something isn't right in Kitz River. The people are superstitious and they believe the GOATBOY is watching so you best behave.

name: The Chain to Bind You to Earth
description: You get a call from your Grandma to go visit your uncle in a forgotten town. Chop wood, wash socks, and enter the cosmic void. Created in 30 days for the Haunted PS1 2020 Halloween Jam with a Folk Horror Theme.

name: Fiddler's Wood
description: Fiddler's Wood is an atmospheric horror experience about being lost in the woods, it was made in 4 weeks by a solo developer for the Haunted PS1 Jam with a theme of "Folk Horror".

name: Feed Pete
description: The villages junk food eating plant is sick and needs feeding. Feed it with Junk food and popcorn. before poor Pete crosses the rainbow bridge. But beware. Not everyone wants to see Pete grow!

name: Mappy
description: Homebrew Atari 2600 port

name: Pac-Athlon
description:
Compete in five different events with Pac-Man and co.!

Pac-Athlon is a minigame that was originally released in 1999 as part of a Japan-only CD-ROM release from Namco known as "Pac-Man no Desktop Daisakusen". This version is a fanmade remake built from the ground-up. It faithfully recreates every aspect of the original while also providing a few new things to play around with.

The Retro Mode covers the game with the classic pixel graphics of Pac-Man's arcade games and a heavy dose of Namco fanservice as you can select from a whopping 17 different characters! You can also compete with friends locally in the game's alternative multiplayer modes!

name: Feed Me Billy
description: Feed Me Billy Demake is a 2020 horror game developed by CrackedGhostGames. It is a 8-bit version of Puppet Combo's Feed Me Billy.

name: Ruptus
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Vanishing Point
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Gratia
description: As a child of Snowcrown Village you have been selected as the "bearer" for the annual Gratia Ceremony. It is your job to travel around Mosco Island defeating the guardians and earning their respective orbs, so that you can complete the ceremony. However, not everything is quite as straightforward as it seems... This year might be a bit different...

name: Super Mario Bros. 5
description: Super Mario Bros. 5 is a fan game and is suppose to be a fan made sequel to the original quadology. The Game is inspired by the old Classic Mario Games (SMB3 and SMBW mainly).

name: My U.S. Trucking Skills
description: Sin descripción

name: Kirby Fighters 2 Memory Match-Up
description: Kirby Fighters 2 Memory Match-Up is a memory game for the Play Nintendo website. In the game the player flips over cards and has to match copy abilities with each other.

name: Pokémon: Desert Bus
description: Sin descripción

name: Relevo's Snowboarding
description: Sin descripción

name: Hong Kong 2099
description: Sin descripción

name: Drift 'N' Thrift
description: Drift 'N' Thrift is an arcade game where you drift away from police while collecting gold and coins.

name: Guitar Hero III Suicide
description: Guitar Hero III Suicide is an unlicensed version of Guitar Hero III for the PlayStation 2 which adds more songs.

name: Retro Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario 64 EX Alo
description: A fork of SM64EX with extra features. It also includes support for other platforms.

name: Super Mario 64 NX
description: A port of Super Mario 64 for 64-bit platforms, including Windows, Linux and Nintendo Switch. It has support for mods via PAK files and was based on the Super Mario 64 decompilation.

name: Super Mario 64 Android Port
description: A port of Super Mario 64 for Android, fork of Super Mario 64 Port.

name: Super Mario 64 Nintendo 3DS Port
description: A fork of Super Mario 64 Port which has enhancements over the previous Super Mario 64 3DS Port, like a touchscreen camera control in the style of Super Mario 64 DS, along with performance improvements.

name: Sokoban
description: A mod for Dinothawr which implements four levels from the original Sokoban game.

name: Rhythum
description: You are piloting the Orchestra’s new Rhythum mobile suit unit, when the ship you are on is attacked by a fleet of enemy suits known as the Conductors. Do you have what it takes to survive the Conductors’ attack?

name: Deer in the Headlights
description: Deer in the Headlights is a game about the strained relationship between a young deer and her dad as they drive to the airport. Navigate through a branched narrative to try and repair their relationship (or not).

name: Please Leave Me Alone
description: This is an anti-dating game. The goal is to make the characters hate you. If you click on the heart in the corner it will tell you how you're doing.

name: Miss Input 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Hungry Shark Arena
description: Hungry Shark Arena is a game in the Hungry Shark Franchise. Unlike most of the games, it is a browser game developed by Ubisoft Nano. It revolves around players competing in a battle royale, eating food to grow bigger, fighting for survival, and killing their enemies to win.

name: Battle City Remake
description:
Battle City Remake is a remake of the original game produced and published by Namco at the year 1985. The game is a multi-directional shooter where you control a tank that must destroy all 20 enemies in each stage to advance to the next level. The enemy tanks on the other side attempt to destroy the player's base as well as the player.

The remake contains all the original 35 stages of the game, but with improved graphics. Like always the idea of our remake is improve the game visuals, but keep the gameplay the most close possible to the original game.

name: Hack 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Rainbow Brite: Journey to Rainbow Land
