description: Sin descripción

name: MP1: Bowser Circle
description: Sin descripción

name: gjpg
description: Sin descripción

name: Tunneling 2048
description: Tunneling 2048 is a variant of 2048 but extra spaces are created every time a new number is added up.

name: Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs: Matching Pairs
description: Match the Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs characters and dinosaurs together.

name: Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs: Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Join Pebbles, Bam-Bam, Dino and all your favourite Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs characters in this fun jigsaw puzzle!

name: The Freddy Files
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights at Freddy's AR Lite
description: Five Nights at Freddy's AR Lite is a recreation of Five Nights at Freddy's AR Special Delivery, without any augmented reality.

name: Shaolin Carcará
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario 64: Royal Legacy
description: Sin descripción

name: Risk of Rain: Starstorm
description: Starstorm is currently the biggest content mod for Risk of Rain (ModLoader) featuring new survivors, items, enemies, stages, artifacts and bosses. Starstorm focuses on expanding the content of Risk of Rain by adding a whole new layer of diversity to improve gameplay and breathe new life into the game.

name: La Nuit
description: La Nuit is a platformer representing the Art Deco art movement, with elements from Cassandre to Lempicka. Collect the glasses, and wine bottles and avoid the ghost to win!

name: Assembly Line
description: Assembly Line is a facility map created in UDMF format with a warm color scheme and clean visual style. The map makes use of arena based encounters, modern scripting capabilities and a dynamic, purpose written soundtrack scoring your playthrough.

name: Fog
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Bubble Shooter: Jungle Pop
description: Match 3 colors and Clear Levels. Bubble Shooter is a classic puzzle game with simple rules that players of all ages can enjoy!

name: Atlantis: Alien Space Shooter
description:
You are Earth's last hope!
Entrusted with the most advanced submarines, your mission is to defend humanity against swarms of alien monsters emerged from the oceans.
Shower the enemies with rains of bullets while dodging their vicious attacks with your masterful maneuvers. Recover treasured technology from the lost civilization of Atlantis to power up your fleet.

name: Half-Life: Source Fixed
description: As we all know, Half-Life: Source is a port of Half-Life to the source engine by Valve, and it's buggy as hell. As the source engine was updated, so was Half-Life: Source, however, those updates brought more bugs than fixed them.

name: The World's Hardest Game HTML5
description: A remastered version of The World's Hardest Game made after the closure of Adobe Flash Player.

name: Surf
description: Surf is a browser game developed by Microsoft that is shipped with the Microsoft Edge web browser. In the game, the player must control a surfer as they move across a body of water while also collecting power-ups and evading obstacles and a kraken. The game features three game modes (classic, time trial, and slalom), has character customization, and supports keyboard, mouse, touch and gamepad controls.

name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Proto
description:
This prototype is an is an interpretation of various development phases of the game based on the Alttp prototype assets. This is not an authentic prototype nor does it represent a single or specific point of development.

This is a result of 4 months (maybe 5) of “behind the scenes” hard work, a few assembly hacks and fixes etc. This game was known as A Link To The Past and only has been renamed into A Link To The Proto for the release to stand on it’s own.

There is a lot of changes, prototype assets that made it into the game, but unfortunately due to the multiple iterations of the same tilesets and a rather limited space for graphics, only a few select ones made it into the reconstruction.

But still, there is a lot of places to explore and many unseen things to discover from the proto content that was cut from the final vanilla game by Nintendo.

name: Idle Ants
description: Ants are the true lords of the underground and they live among us. They’ve been building cities and expanding their communities well before man was able to cobble together his first hut. Now, you can enter the land of ants and see first hand their organized life and structured world take shape.

name: Miner Gun Builder
description: You are the captain of a space ship and fly through missions to earn money. With the money you can buy parts to build your weapon in your space ship. You can also buy bigger and better ships which can fit more parts. Building a small weapon is straight forward, but later you can build extremely strong weapons if you use the available space wisely.

name: Shootero: Galaxy Space Shooter
description: Shootero is an arcade shooting game like galaga shooter with stylized gameplay. It is not a mundane alien shooter game, but highlighted with a combination of classic galaxy attack gameplay and rogue-lite features. Shootero definitely puts you on fire every time you play.

name: Breaker Fun: Rescue Adventure
description: Classic bricks and balls free puzzle games meet rescue adventure! Aim and crush all the bricks and obstacles to brick out the trap and save the man!

name: Pixel Quest
description: Step into a lengthy and varied gameplay experience featuring solo dungeons, co-op PVE dungeons, and ranked PVP! Choose your starting hero from a nostalgic cast - Warrior, Mage, or Rogue - and then forge your strategy as you progress through a deep, fully customizable skill tree and seek out powerful new items.

name: Pixel Stars Digital Dreamhouse
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Mafia: Tycoon Manager
description:
Get ready for a gritty Idle Mafia simulation game experience!
Manage insidious businesses, gather talented Capos to carry out your bidding, and occupy new territory through any means necessary.

name: Miners Settlement: Idle RPG
description: Miners Settlement: Idle RPG is a clicker game which will take you on an open-world adventure full of fantastical creatures. Go on a mighty quest to craft equipment, mine for materials and fight enemies in classic RPG battles!

name: Zgr3d
description: Zgr3d is an adaption of the DOS game Kret for the Amiga. The aim of the player is to destroy Tetris-like blocks that fall down from the top of the screen. With each move the whole line of blocks drops down one line unless it cannot go further because the composition of the game field does not allow it. The player needs to move carefully through the field destroying the blocks without being squashed.

name: Astro Blox Revisited
description: Astro Blox Revisited is an adaptation of Soko-Ban. The aim for the player is to place boxes in the designated places. There are lots of new ideas that change the Soko-Ban aspect. Some fields create inversions which either help or make the task much more difficult.

name: Hop Mania
description: Hop Mania is a game included in the Google Play Games app.

name: CastleDefense: RaiseArcher
description: A simple RPG-type defense game! After equipping a secondary weapon from level 5, the fun begins!

name: Bouncefield: Bricks Breaker
description: Bouncefield is a free offline retro Arkanoid bounce ball game.

name: Idle Game 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Apes vs Helium
description: Apes vs. Helium is a game that was made in 2020 and is a first person shooter based off of the tower defense game series Bloons TD. In the game you play as the unique monkeys that appear throughout the series, starting off as the Dart Monkey. You begin upgrading your weapons, changing classes, and buying extra support to help you along the way.

name: Legends Core Plus
description: The Legends Core Plus console plugs and plays on any TV and includes a high-performance wireless gamepad. and 100 built-in arcade and console games, as well streaming and connectivity capabilities,

name: Art of Fighting: Trouble in South Town
description: Art of Fighting Trouble in South Town contains several levels like fighting / bonus stages / interactive levels.

name: Space Invaders Micro Player
description: Jump in your spaceship and fend off the waves of attacking enemy invaders before they land. Originally released in 1978, SPACE INVADERS had a revolutionary impact, becoming an instant global phenomenon among arcade enthusiasts and introducing many others to video games.

name: Gaplus
description: A port of Gaplus developed by M2 for the NES capabilities, released in Namco Museum Archives (Namcot Collection).

name: Friday Night Funkin' B-Side Remixes
description:
Remixes the games music and gives the visuals a fresh coat of paint.

Welcome to the new and improved version of B-Side Remixes:
B-Side Redux
The initial release of B-Side Redux includes Weeks 1, 2, and 7, the Tutorial, along with all of the original content from B-Sides classic.

name: Isochronism
description: Rune wakes up in a surreal landscape, only to be asked to solve riddles for unknown reasons. Accompanied by their friend Shara they shall see just how deep the rabbit hole goes.

name: Sabritas Pac-Man
description: Sabritas Pac-Man was released in collaboration with Sabritas; effectively the Mexican version of Frito-Lay. During this promotion, Pac-Man Tazos were included in specially-marked potato chip bags, alongside a giveaway promotion and a special online game.

name: Pac-Man Collection
description: Features Pac-Man, Pac-Mania, New Rally-X, Galaga, Galaga '88, Dig Dug, Super Xevious, Rolling Thunder, Dragon Spirit, and Mappy. Additional ROMs for various formats (NES, Game Boy Advance, Atari 2600/7800, etc.) can be added via a Micro SD card.

name: Bandai Namco Arcade Blast!
description: Features Pac-Man, Pac-Mania, Dig Dug, Galaga, Galaxian, New-Rally-X. Mappy, Sky Kid, The Tower of Druaga, and Xevious.

name: Pac-Man Desktop Arcade
description: Another Pac-Man port for tiny LCD devices.

name: Pac-Man Game Keyring
description: Pac-Man original port in Retro Game Keyring.

name: Pac-Man Tilt
description: A port of the original Pac-Man controlled by tilting the console itself; not to be confused with the 2011 game.

name: Micro Arcade: Ms. Pac-Man
description: A handheld port of Ms. Pac-Man.

name: Pac-Man Micro Player: 40th Anniversary Edition
description: Based on Sega Genesis clone hardware. Compared to the non-40th model, it is gold instead of yellow, and the side artwork is a lenticular print.

name: Atari Retro Handheld Console: Pac-Man Edition
description: Features 60 built-in games, including the Atari 2600 version of Pac-Man.

name: DungeonRush
description: Collect heros to enlarge your army while defending yourself from the monsters. Each level has a target length of the hero queue. Once it's reached, you will be sent to the next level and start over. There are lots of stuff that will be adjusted according to the level you're on, including factors of HP and damage, duration of Buffs and DeBuffs, the number and strength of monsters and so on.

name: Immortal Rising
description:
Grow your immortal beyond the limits and defeat true evil!
Grow your immortal through various growth content and enjoy the stylish skills and controls.

name: Hello Kitty Pac-Man
description:
The Hello Kitty ♥ Pac-Man video game was first released in 2017 as limited-time event for Pac-Man + Tournaments. It was later republished in 2020 as part of the World's Smallest Tiny Arcade line by Super Impulse. These are the features found in the Hello Kitty game that differ from the original arcade:

All mazes have been changed in unique shapes and colors, such as one resembling a rubber duck.
The ghosts have white bows on their heads.
Some levels only feature three ghosts instead of four.
The giant Pac-Man in the first intermission is replaced with Hello Kitty; this is the only time she actually appears in-game.

name: Microsoft Edge: Surf
description:
Surf is a web browser game by Microsoft that is included with the Microsoft Edge web browser. In the game, the player controls a surfer as they move across a body of water while also collecting power-ups and evading obstacles and the kraken.

The game is accessible by the Microsoft Edge error screen or by going to edge://surf in the Edge browser. A lite version of the game with limited features is also hosted on Microsoft's website, which is playable with any modern web browser.

name: Hot Glue
description: Create "Figures" and then do erotic things with them!

name: The Marvelous Snail
description: This game tells the story of a weak snail who trains to become stronger and faster.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask Online
description: A mod which allows online multiplayer while playing The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask. This mod needs an application called ModLoader64 to work.

name: The Wand of Gamelon Remastered
description: A fan remaster of Zelda: The Wand of Gamelon, an official Zelda game for the Phillips CD-i, changing some features of the original game in order to improve playability.

name: The Faces of Evil Remastered
description: A fan remaster of The Link: The Faces of Evil, an official Zelda game for the Phillips CD-i, changing some features of the original game in order to improve playability.

name: Mighty & Ray in Sonic the Hedgehog 2
description: This ROM hack swaps Sonic and Tails for Mighty and Ray, with adapted abilities inspired by their Sonic Mania versions.

name: Dashing Mariachis
description:
Dashing Mariachis is a Mexican culture inspired game, situated in early 20th
century and heavily relying in Mariachi music with a subtle 8bit treatment, puts the player inside a 3D side-scrolling runner adventure with a gameplay shift at the ending of every stage where now the player has to hit musical notes accordingly in order to keep the Serenata (musical performance) running.

name: Walpurgis
description:
Walpurgis is...

A gameplay mod that works with Doom, Hexen and Heretic, straight out of the Box!
Focused on giving everything three fire-modes without needing any extra resources, just balancing them around standard blue and green mana/ammo consumption.
Upgrades for each of those afformentioned fire-modes (think Trailblazer).
Strong and fun, but balanced. Extra care has been put into making everything have punch and impact and be fun to use but not the level of overkill. I'm a mad perfectionist when I get going; so repeatedly testing something over and over whilst I tweak values is not unusual.
Gothically medieval, with a taste of moderate-high fantasy. Magic is meant to semi-common in the world, whether through artifacts, or mystical items.
Based around play where you get used to using both your arsenal and your inventory items in tandem. Flechettes and Discs of Repulsion are really useful now; so use them!
Rigorously playtested with custom doom, heretic, and hexen wads to get a feel for how it plays with them; and to see if I can find reason to switch between my arsenal all the time (which is the sign of a good arsenal, in my opinion).
Is named this way because... well, "Hexen" are witches from germanic folklore. Walpurgisnacht is a grand festival for witches in general. So as a festival of new content for Hexen related shenanigans; its doubly relevant.

name: SM64EX
description:
SM64EX (also known as sm64ex) is a fork of the original Super Mario 64 Port. This fork was made to be easier to mod, being later forked to other repositories like Render96 and Super Mario 64 Plus. It has support for many mods like DynOS, Cheater, Mario Odyssey's Moveset and others.
It has integrated new camera options, cheats and visual enhancements for modern platforms, supporting Windows, Linux, MacOS, FreeBSD, Raspberry Pi and WebGL.

name: Brutal Doom: Ali Jr's Challenge
description:
In order to survive this behemoth of Brutal Doom, you need high alertness, accuracy, cover, and a desire for adventure (to find secrets and assets). Without just one of those, you'll die several times.

This is the mod for everyone who craves (or simply wants) a hardcore version of brutal doom since it brings the intensity of Brutal Doom up to a 10 on a 1 point scale of badassery. If Project Brutality is like Brutal Doom on steroids, this version is like Brutal Doom on speed and crack cocaine.

Monsters are up to an extreme level of relentlessness. For instance, the zombies are more accurate, have faster fire rates, and fire faster tracers. Imps can throw up to four fireballs in a single charge and they have a flamethrower attack for close range combat, their balls also scorch the ground for a maximum insult to injury.

Barons and knights can sprint and jump at you, often reaching you sooner than you could imagine, and Barons can throw small BFG rounds at you. Archviles can summon monsters very fast and their fire-rape leaves continuous flames on the ground. I'll leave the Cyberdemons and Masterminds to your imagination since what they do is not pretty at all.

The good news is that the player is given many advantages. Unlike BD Redemption, where Doomguy is weakened to reality, both Doomguy and his enemies are tougher. Doomguy's attacks very efficiently with fast reloading, punching, shooting, and the assistance of an item store.

Some new weapons include the pistol, SMG, Auto-Shotgun, sniper-rifle, Dual-Chainsaws, and Cyberdemon's Rocket launcher (which is only available in the Heavy weapon class). Many weapons have a new tertiary fire; like adjusting the sniper scope, malt-rounds for the minigun, Rocket launcher grenade mode, and the dual wielding function was moved to the tertiary fire mode.

name: Brutal Heretic RPG
description: This is the continuation of Sergeant Mark IV's Brutal Heretic mod. Well, after been seemingly abandoned for a few years, we have continued Brutal Heretic where Sarge and Seidolon has left off.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time Online
description: A mod which allows online multiplayer while playing The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. This mod needs an application called ModLoader64 to work. It also supports cosmetic and audio mods, as well as specific events and collectibles that can be purchased by using a specific currency called Rubies in Morshu's shop (adapted from the CD-i Zelda games).

name: Uchu Mega Fight
description: Uchu Mega Fight has three styles for each character. Choose a system that is close to your taste and the game you are familiar with .

name: Earthworm Jim 1+2: 25th Anniversary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dino Island: The Four Crystals
description:
Your main objective is to rescue the crystals stolen by an evil wizard who lives on the island with the dinosaurs, for that the guardian needs to go through stages with challenges and collect crystals.

At the end of each part of the island the dino will have to face the evil wizard who took the crystals, so if you defeat him he will retrieve a crystal and continue to the next challenge.

name: Fan of Guns
description: Play with your friends a first-person pixel online shooter. A large number of maps, skins and weapons! Shoot from the tank, AWP, Kalash, multi-barrel, shotgun, and other weapons!

name: Pocket Ants
description: Sin descripción

name: The UnMaking
description: Carve a path through space and time to the depths of hell in these 33 maps split across three chapters from legendary mapper Scwiba.

name: Safire Eshgh
description:
Safire Eshgh is a third-person action adventure video game made by Iranian center for digital Islamic revolution publishing.

The story is set in the year 61 AH about "Mehran" of Rey an Iranian man who is suffering from past trauma and his meeting with Mukhtar al-Thaqafi.

name: I Can't Remember a Time I Didn't Need You
description: A fog has overtaken a city. Everyone who was in the city has now changed. Word spreads that this fog can support life that isn’t supported on earth. You are going to see if the fog will support your life or if you are the reason the fog has come.

name: Blastomancer: The Puzzle Game
description: Blastomancer: The Puzzle Game is a logical puzzle game with a fun, playful story and a unique art style to match.

name: Draw Battle!

name: Best of Solitaire
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost Grimoires 1-3
description: Sin descripción

name: Deep Relics
description: Deep underwater you drive a submarine to find relics.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Eternal Rain
description: After the events of Majora's Mask, Link journeys into the outskirts of Hyrule and stumbles upon the Peahat Pub, where he finds out the residents have been stuck in a rain storm for the past 2,000 days.

name: Enter the Skinja
description: When cowboys and ninjas meet strange things happen... This was made for Haunted PS1 Jam 2020. It is an experiment in 2d & 3d space...a skins-periment.

name: Granny's House
description: In a certain town, a strange rumor is spreading about a crazed granny who kidnaps children. The children are locked in Granny's House. Will they be able to escape from the mad mansion without getting caught? Play a hair-raising 8-player game of tag right now!

name: Sven's SudokuPad
description: Sven's SudokuPad finally lets you play your own Sudoku puzzles in the same app as used by Cracking the Cryptic in their videos. Created by Sven, the same developer who has created and improved the Cracking the Cryptic Sudoku webapp over the past year.

name: Persona 5: Goro Akechi Dating Simulator
description: Goro Akechi is a character from the hit popular jrpg game Persona 5 and Persona 5 Royal. In this game you could date him and do certain romantic scenarios. This game have 14 endings, some short and some long and it's decided by the options you picked. So if you are a Goro Akechi fan and have him as your husbando, you need to play this game to fulfill your Goro Akechi needs.

name: Makin Biscuits
description: Makin Biscuits is a short, no-pressure browser game that combines visual novel and adventure game elements.

name: Unitres Dreams
description: An experimental 2D platformer with a wacky aesthetic inspired by games from the Megadrive

name: Steps
description: Steps is a small Minit-like game where instead of dying from time, you die after a certain amount of steps. Explore the cursed island, solve puzzles, and find the hidden coins. Try to run away from the island by finding the Icarus wings as it is the only way to escape the cursed island.

name: NationWar: Annals
description: This is a grand strategy + real-time battle sandbox game with the theme of Spring and Autumn and Warring States. The game starts on the land of China in the eighth century BC. Players will act as one of the countries and start a long battle for hegemony with other countries.

name: Mission Idle
description: Mission Idle is an idle game where your main focus is to grind for levels gold and other riches that will allow you to move further in the zone stages. Mission Idle is played by being AFK. Most of the mechanics in the game are automated.

name: Hover Ship
description: Hover Ship is an arcade game in which you have to control a floating ship on an obstacle course, collect coins and set new records.

name: Anagrams
description: Match colorful tiles & solve 1400+ brain-teasing anagrams across 4 unique game modes in this relaxing puzzler

name: Monads II
description: The second work following [Monads], released in 2019.This is a puzzle-tactics game without RNGs, so you can revert your action anytime. Find your own solution of prepared stages, following the story of 6 protagonists.

name: Pokémon Sword & Shield GBA
description:
As the name implies, this rom tries to adapt the history and region of the original pokemon sword and shield games to gba
with characters, events and even systems.

name: Minimalist Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Blackthorn Arena: Path of Kiren
description: The Path of Kiren DLC introduces a brand new story, player could unlock new skills as well as Samurai Legendary armors. The ronin from the distant eastern lands is coming to Freelands. Be Prepared!

name: SwordBall
description: SwordBall is a free to play 2D sword fighting football game. Football meets fencing? Join your team in the most exciting, fast paced game! Swing your sword and defend your goal or grab the ball and score. Lead your team to victory and join the future of sports!

name: Let Yourself Out, Eddie Kaspbrak!
description: An epilogue to Use Your Outside Voice, Richie Tozier! Eddie Kaspbrak has a series of conversations.

name: Sillyfun Valley
description: Francis's best friend and canine companion, Chewbarka, is missing! Join her on a hilarious animated adventure as she searches the quirky neighborhoods of Sillyfun Valley to find her dear doggie. Along the way she will meet eccentric inhabitants, solves puzzles, and even find romance!

name: A Traveler's Photo Album
description: You will play a traveler, strayed into a castle, the owner of the castle is a candid expert, in the different world travel around the use of magic candid, have a thick album, which is full of treasures! You find the photo album, but the photos in the album are sealed in the room, you need to open it.

name: Faircroft's Antiques: Home for Christmas
description: Mia Faircroft is Home for Christmas! Explore her hometown in this wonderful Hidden Object game, perfect for the season. Search through detailed locations, fix up worn antiques, and save the holidays for the community of Mikamaw Point!

name: Leap of Love
description: Leap of Love is a fantasy game where you play as Kaheroux a frog turned prince by a shady wizard. The catch of that spell is that he needs to find and marry a princess within a month or go back to being a frog.

name: The Grim Ending
description: The Grim Ending is a humerous classic Point and Click adventure game. Old school gameplay that comes with word commands, pixel art and a full talky storyline with moral decisions and several endings.

name: Scrapping Simulator
description: A Low Poly eWaste Scrapping Simulator Game.Start your own eWaste Handling business

name: Thieves of Egypt
description: Thieves of Egypt is a solitaire game played with two decks. It is related to the well-known solitaire game Forty Thieves.

name: Epilogue
description: A single line of love poetry.

name: E6 Connect
description:
CONNECTING GOLFERS, GAMERS, AND FANS TO THE FUTURE OF GOLF 
E6 CONNECT is the highest-quality, most lifelike and customizable golf software ever created. Use it with launch monitors to teach or train on the driving range, to compete in leagues and online events at a commercial facility, or just play fun games at home with friends and family. 
 
E6 CONNECT features stunning 4k graphics and more flexibility, customization and control than ever before. What makes our new generation of golf software truly revolutionary is its massive network designed to connect golfers around the world, from private peer-to-peer play to custom to global tournaments.

name: Foreverred
description:
Foreverred is a mod of Celeste Classic developed in over a year. Starting as an update to the developer's first mod, Everred, it grew into a full sequel, and eventually into the biggest CELESTE Classic mod ever released (and possibly one of the biggest PICO-8 projects).

The mod is over three times the size of the original game, and features brand new levels, mechanics, sprites, and music.

name: Gun Witch
description: Help Beretta become the best witch ever in this 2D action platformer shoot 'em up! She's going on an adventure to beat up monsters, talk to cute NPCs, and discover the dark history of Luninsula all while making lifelong friends.

name: Ace & Hearts
description: The staff christmas party is tonight, and "Ace" Casey is flirting with her colleague Lila instead of working. In a couple of hours the drinks will start, and who knows what will happen if Ace plays her cards right...

name: Ring Miner
description: An open world space mining game. Explore a vast planetary ring where every spot on every rock can be mined for minerals. Use your transport ship to drop off the mining rover, anywhere in the ring system, and start digging! Your capable 6-wheeled rover can climb many obstacles.

name: Hero's Spirit
description:
Hero's Spirit is a retro-themed 2D RPG, an homage to games from an era past. It focuses on exploration and searching the world for scattered items, discovering their uses, and finding secrets and shortcuts that make traversing the world faster and more convenient. As you progress through the game, you'll continue to make new discoveries in areas you've previously visited, and gain new abilities that allow you to enter new areas. 
 
Controls and combat in Hero's Spirit are simplified and designed to stay out of your way - in fact, you can play the entire game using only directional inputs, so that you can focus your energy on choosing your next move. Set to the score of an 8-bit soundtrack, explore a meticulously hand-crafted world filled to the brim with content and secrets.

name: Without My Arms
description: Short but really challenging game about reaching the top of a tower by jumping exclusively with your tongue.

name: Bust-A-Move Frenzy
description: Sin descripción

name: The Settlers: Explorer Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: 1 Screen Platformer 2
description: Try, die, retry in this challenging but fair precision platformer that takes place on 1 screen. Ultra tight controls, dozens of traps, 8 playable characters each with a unique gameplay style. Great for speedrunning, and 100% completionists. Also, no water levels!

name: Hero Tower
description: Play as the Hero as he is dropped into the Hero Simulation Machine MKI and take-on a tower full of puzzles and monsters. Equip a variety of tools and weapons found in chests on each floor, that have limited uses and reset every floor, giving each one a unique challenge.

name: Euchre
description: Euchre is a homebrew card game for the NES.

name: Breaking the 4th wall
description: Breaking the 4th Wall is a point and click adventure game taking place inside a world of comics. Adrian, the main character, deals with daily life struggles and goes out on a journey for self-realization and breaking out of the confines of his world.

name: Fortress V2
description: Fortress V2 is a strategic online multiplayer artillery shooting game. Team up with of 4 friends and demolish other teams with your tactical movement strategy. Fortress series already proved its fun core in Asia with 50M accumulated users. Enjoy various tanks with different performance.

name: 10 Second Shuriken
description: 10 Second Shuriken is fast paced action platformer. Your task is to defeat all the enemies in the level within 10 seconds. Use your parkour, agility, slow mo ability and explosive shurikens to dodge lasers, spikes, enemy fire to destroy all the enemies in time.

name: Twisty Tumble
description: It's a tricky puzzle game in Virtual Reality. Chill out in the calm, hypnotic undersea environment, and challenge your mind to reassemble the pyramids!

name: Warlord: Attrition
description: A once peaceful kingdom has come under siege. The King you have pledged your loyalty to has been murdered. The realm is plunged into chaos. Your enemies conspire to upend the peaceful realm. Can you unite the lords to expel the invaders and disrupt their evil plot?

name: USSR 2021
description: In 1987, an unknown object fell on the territory of USSR. After a fall in a radius of 50 kilometers from the epicenter, any connection with all populated areas is completely lost. In 2021 satellite images revealed anomalous formations in the radius of the fall of the object.

name: Went: One Alive
description: A lonely city survived by high technology at the end of the day. A girl who can invade the brain terminal to read the mind. The myriad doubts and hidden crises caused by a small case. You need to find clues in the corners of the city. You have to look for clues in people's minds and memories.

She tries to keep the human world safe but the monsters have been suffering likewise. Therefore she is confused what's right to do because of her half-blood identity.

name: Aspect of Daedalus

name: Duke Nukem 3D: Fallout Freeze
description:
Duke Nukem 3D: Fallout Freeze — is a mod that includes one level for Duke Nukem 3D Atomic Edition with custom art and code. It’s a Christmas themed mod whose main task is to bring a holiday atmosphere, but keep the vanilla style.

The level takes place in a captured by the aliens shopping mall “Queen's Mall”. Although the first part of the map is linear, the second part is designed for fully free exploration.

name: Delusion
description:
Delusion is a short horror game inspired by Granny for mobile devices Android.

Short Description about Delusion:

Someday you driving to your new job late at night.
After a long road, your car is out of gas but you find in the forest an old abandoned house. When you reach a door something hits your back.
Then you wake up in this house and you are not alone here.

name: Bunny Hop
description: A simple, yet challenging, 2D platforming game based in a world of exploration and hope.

name: 112 Operator: Water Operations
description: New DLC Water Operations will extend your responsibility to rivers, lakes, and seas.

name: Cartoon Puzzler Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Back to Belt
description: are you ready to back to asteroids belt?

description: Spun off from 'Beyond Eden', 'Beyond Eden: Dear Edward' is a Boys’ Love Life simulation game starring Edward, a naïve young aristocrat. Hone his skills as detective, psychic, or gambler, seek fortune and adventure in the streets and salons of 1890s London, and romance two desirable young men!

description: 4Line is a real-time take on the classic 4 in a Row board game. Play in fast-paced 1-minute matches, trying to get 4 in a row before your opponent does. Collect gems on the board to speed up your gameplay and gain an edge on your opponent.

name: Hentai Queens

name: Lux Sine

name: Out of Bounds
description: Sometimes volleyball can take you places.

name: Lost Lands: Redemption
description: “Lost Lands: Redemption” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.

name: Nefasto's Misadventure: Meeting Noeroze
description: A Meta Point'n Click Adventure in the Central Unit of your Computer.

name: Colonials Programme
description: Play as a robot managing the needs of your colony in space! Build machines, harvest the elements, shelter colonists and launch rockets, in this colony building resource management game.

name: Bunny Hop
description: A simple, yet challenging, 2D platforming game based in a world of exploration and hope. Discover a world of mythology while experiencing challenging game play with simple controls. Hop from platform to platform while exploring different areas but don't fall down or you might have to do it again.

name: Some Say It Has Always Been Here
description: Switch off your phone. Do not go outside. Do not accept invitations from strangers. Do not turn on your phone. Only trust information obtained via dreams. Avoid panicking when stopped by a police officer. Do not attempt to leave. Avoid thought. Do not stare directly into the sun. Do not stare directly at people. Do not expect anything exciting to happen.

name: Bloks
description: A small god-game with a Tetris-like mechanic. Can you create mankind and help them escape the blocks?

name: Ninja Ranger: Shinobi Arashi Superhero's Gaiden
description: Ninja Ranger uses a realistic pixel style, bringing you back to the NES, 8-bit, 16-bit pixel game era; the game is also using the classic 2D platform action gameplay, this is an retro action game with a refreshing impact. it tells the story of a legendary shadow ninja--Ray, the shadow ninja punishes evil and save the world. In the game you will play a ninja superhero and fight against evil enemies.

name: Motesolo: No Girlfriend Since Birth
description:
Motesolo: No Girlfriend Since Birth
Interactive Movie.
On a late afternoon in Seoul, There are two people having a blind date in cafe.
But this man is so suspicious. He acts like the man who doesn't have any girl friend.
Unfortunately this is true. yes. He is NGSB. No GirlFriend Since Birth.

He is 29 years old and There is saying that the virgin in 30 will finally become a black magician .
There are only bunch of boys in his life like men's middle school, men's high school, major in computer in Univ and military..
This is last chance to have a girl friend before turning into 30 in this blind date.
His life depends on your choices.

name: Staff Only
description: A card battler where you play cards by solving a puzzle with those cards! Play on the same board (literally) as your enemies.

name: Runes Saga: Puzzle Adventure
description: An Super cool card RPG combined with match-3 gameplay! Immersive hybrid Multi-national mythology, classic fairy tale, fable and cutting-edge graphics.

name: Ninja Platformer
description: Ninja Platformer is a very unique game. There are multiple modes including "Battle Royal", "Platformer", and more to come. All of these modes are side scroller. The game will always be free with many cool skins to buy!

name: Hammena Dreams
description:
Everyone had a childhood dream when they were younger. To be an astronaut, a knight. Become an explorer and adventure across a world of imagination to free it from the dark essence that took over it.
Run, explore, dash ‘n’ slash, use the power of ancient relics and defeat the monsters left by your fallen friends to take back your friends' memorial tokens, in order to remember them, without their demons.
A fun and interactive exploration and boss dueling game with a unique approach on cancer, causing it to be an emotional rollercoaster once the player realizes the true meaning of the game.

name: Caravaneer 2
description: A post-apocalyptic trade simulation game with turn based isometric combats. The game features detailed economics simulation and a rich branching story where your choices actually matter.

name: Escape Void
description: Sin descripción

name: GranAge Online
description: 2d-anime themed side scrolling MMO.

name: Notes of the Outskirts
description:
Close future. Rumors say megacorps are getting mad over a possible treasure. Bandits, mercenaries and opportunistic merchants are showing up, and of course you're too. Whatever it is, you're determined to find it and sell it to whoever will propose the best price. That's where the adventure begins.

Note of the outskirts is a classic party-based role playing game in the vein of titles such as the original Wasteland.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Gerudo Exile
description: A romhack for Link to the Past with an edited overworld and new dungeons

name: Ultima: Exodus Remastered
description:
An almost complete overhaul of this classic RPG, aimed at improving the game without compromising its original appeal and charm. Sprites, backgrounds and UI elements have been redrawn using later entries in the series as a reference.

The interface has been improved within the limitation of the game engine, introducing Quality-Of-Life changes that reduce some of the frustration with the original release. Most notably, cancelling an action during combat (e.g. pressing B at magic spell selection, or selecting Magic on a character that is not capable of casting spells) will not forfeit that character’s turn. It is still possible to pass a turn by pressing B before selecting any action.

Many aspect of the gameplay have been slightly altered to make grinding at lower levels unnecessary, and level progression more rewarding. Defeating monsters found in more dangerous locations such as dungeons is also more rewarding as it provides better loot and more XP.

The combat AI has also been improved, and changes have been introduced to better differentiate the 11 professions and 5 races, including “special abilities” such as critical hits for high level Thieves and extra melee damage for Barbarians.

Almost all the enemies that were present in the computer versions of the game have been added, including Chests (only in Castle Death), Wizards and the Orcus.

Numerous typos and inconsistencies in the game’s text/dialogues have also been fixed, and many dialogue lines that were present but not accessible in the original release have been re-instated. This includes one important clue that had been infamously “removed” (but was actually present in ROM, just not referenced).

name: Dottania
description:
Each protagonist has a different goal, which is not only to develop the town, but also to listen to the needs of the residents. You can also enjoy mini-games such as fishing.
In addition, each country has a different culture and a different landscape depending on the lords you choose.

name: Lesbian Vampire Simulator
description: queer vampire action with women and swords

name: Sword & Sorcery Bundle
description: Five fantasy adventures in one epic bundle from Digerati! This bundle contains Fall of Light: Darkest Edition, Odallus: The Dark Call, Omensight: Definitive Edition, Slain: Back From Hell, and Unexplored: Unlocked Edition.

name: Digerati Presents: RPG Bundle Vol. 1
description: A triple-pack of rewarding RPG experiences from Digerati. This bundle contains Tower of Time, Stories: The Path of Destinies, and Sunless Sea: Zubmariner Edition.

name: Digerati Horror Bundle Vol. 2
description: Hell spawn! Psycho killers! Eldritch entities! This hair-rising horror collection has it all! This bundle contains Demon Pit, Slayaway Camp: Butcher's Cut, and Tamashii.

name: Alice's Jigsaw Time Travel
description: Solve 100 unique patchwork mosaics with your favorite heroes!!

name: Katrina's Kurse
description: Venture into the mysterious Arcane Temple as Katrina, a cursed magicless witch in search of an ancient Dark Tome to give her the ability to cast magic.

name: Click on their Heads
description: Do you like a cheap chuckle? The objective of the game is fairly straight forward - trolls will spawn in increasing numbers and rush towards you. Your job is to click on their heads. If you do that, you progress. If you don't, you lose the game when they touch you.

name: Pack Per Duck
description: Pack per Duck-2d shooter with a change of weapons, go through various levels dodging mines, enemy bullets and suicide bombers, destroy levels, blow up everything around and at the end meet the great and terrible... a rubber duck!

name: Fast Wings
description: But now, thanks to Fast Wings, you have this opportunity. This bird simulator with a third-person view allows you to see the stormy forest river in all its glory, but follow the path of the rings, be careful! At high speed, it is easy to crash into a branch and leave the feathered body...

name: Plataforma branca
description: Find the key to reveal the plataforma branca.

name: Virtual Soldiers
description: A rail shooter. Grab one of 6 weapons, blast through levels filled with enemies, blow up the environments, grab health packs dropped from enemies, and defeat the unique bosses.

name: The Snowman's Journey
description: Help the lost snowman find his way home. Dangers both great and small stand in his way. Avoid rush-hour traffic, an avalanche of snowballs, succumbing to an icy river, and more!

name: Our Church and Halloween: Story Three
description: In a small village on the edge of the island, a young resident named James leaves in search of something. And what is he looking for? He's trying to get to the mountain top before Halloween. He received a letter claiming that if he goes there before Halloween begins, he can bring his parents back from the dead. Is the note correct? Is it good or evil? What's really beyond the forest?

name: Digerati Best Sellers
description:
A triple treat of Digerati hits! This bundle contains Slain: Back From Hell, Snakeybus, and Sunless Sea: Zubmariner Edition.

Slain: Back From Hell: A heavy metal inspired arcade combat game with stunning pixel art visuals, challenging old-school gameplay, and a brutal soundtrack. Fight through a Gothic world and face the deadly overlords that reign over each of its cursed realms. Defeat them to continue your quest, or fail and die gruesomely…

Snakeybus: An absurd arcade-driving game and frantic score-chasing experience where the biggest danger is yourself! Wind through city streets, pick up as many passengers as you can and deliver them to their destination to increase your score AND the length of your bus!

Sunless Sea: Zubmariner Edition: LOSE YOUR MIND. EAT YOUR CREW. DIE. Take the helm of your steamship in a Victorian Gothic roleplaying game of discovery, loneliness and frequent death.

name: Trophy
description: Trophy is a action platformer for the original NES! Take control of the robot Trophy in this exciting new homebrew game. Save the peaceful planet of Gearus 9 from the evil machinations of Lord Q as you run, jump, and blast your way to victory. Collect power-ups along the way and defeat some of the largest bosses ever seen on the NES!

name: A Blinding Void
description: Snow in all directions. Made for the Bitsy Community Secret Santa 2020.

name: Papa's Quiz
description: Papa’s Quiz is a party game for 1-8 players. Use phones or tablets as controllers and compete in multiple question types, where the smartest and fastest player will be the last standing victor! Share screen on Discord or use Steam Remote Play to play with your friends!

name: Mana Gloom
description: Take part in this mana infused action RPG as you blast through hundreds of corrupted minions. Cleanse the Mana Gloom and be celebrated as the champion of the lands.

name: What We Pretend to Be
description: A small game about farming, community, and loss. Farm for the war effort - and listen to the long space people leave behind when they're gone.

name: Laedomanes
description: A First Person Platformer with Parkour elements. Explore ancient Space Monoliths and face off against the sentient Machines. Use collected Laedomanes to improve your gear and travel to artificial star systems via the Wormhole.

name: Jump City
description:
Jump City is a challenging game where you have to jump your way through the skyscrapers of a city. 
 
Jump or double jump from rooftoop to rooftop. If you fall, you loose. Sounds easy, but the further you come, the smaller the skyscrapers become. Therefore, you will have to stay precise and time your jumps correctly to overcome every skyscraper.

name: Eggnog Incorporated
description: Enjoy working as an Eggnog Inspector for a shady company. Verify the color, art, ingredients for batches of eggnog. Its not glamorous but its an honest living. Who knows what surprises are in store for you...

name: Wordeous
description:
Can you play a game with thousands of people? With Wordeous you can! Wordeous allows you to play with your friends or audience. If you are a streamer on Twitch you can play Wordeous with your audience. Thousands of people race to guess the "Wordeous" and win! Wordeous is a fun game that will increase interactivity of streamers with audience. If you're ready for a fierce competition with random game cards in different categories and challenges, let the game begin!
Wordeous is a card game in which you try to explain the "Wordeous Word" to your audience without saying the banned words. Wordeous uses Twitch Chat integration which allows you to receive your audience's answers simultaneously. After you login to your account, you are all set to start a new game with many different categories and hundreds of words!

Wordeous is a multiplayer, co-op game that requires a Twitch account. The player explains the “Wordeous” and your friends and/or audience try to guess the Wordeous by writing their guesses to your Twitch channel’s chat. You can moderate your own match or you can play with your moderator. If you like to play with your moderators, they need to buy a copy of the Wordeous too, however the others who tries to guess "do not" need to buy a copy! You don’t need to be a streamer to play the game, every Twitch account has a chat panel which can be used to play Wordeous!

The scoreboard system allows you to see your most successful viewer of the last game or all games. You and your viewers gather points according to both your and your viewers performance.

Wordeous allows you to have a highly interactive and fun time with your audience.

name: Magic Potion Millionaire
description: Magic Potion Millionaire is an exhilarating 2D side-view action game based on the theme of earning money.

name: Terra Swoop Force
description: GDL has assembled an elite elytra task force for a top-secret, high-risk mission. Step into your Thermal Flight Armor; it’s time to begin the flight of your life!

name: Mario In Mushroom Rix Land 2: Gimmicky Island
description: The sequel to the first Mario In Mushroom Rix Land game. The story follows after the first Mushroom Rix Land game, Bowser has just escaped with his Clown Cart from Rix Land. He took all resources, from his Rix Land castle. And took them to make his very own island called Gimmicky! And build all the death traps, spikes and more! Mario must stop him! Before the Gimmicky island gets more bigger and bigger and destroy the world!!

name: High Heels!
description:
Get ready for the best high heels game ever! This shoe game is fun, this runway is epic, this shoe race is for baddies! The taller your heels are, the easier it will be to escape from the walls. A different obstacle awaits you at each parkour! There are rails on the roof where you have to spread your legs and slide, walls to jump, a stick to balance and a huge podium waiting for you at the end of the road.
Don’t forget! You need to pick as many as high heels on the road so you can walk on the final podium! Walking on the heels will make you feel like a queen! Everyone loves to look perfect and these heels will let you shine like a star! There are many different shoe options in the game! Shiny heels, colorful heels, boot heels, rainbow heels, and even heels with wings!

name: Pocket Mini Golf: Fairway
description: Spend even more time with Pocket Mini Golf. Old rules, new holes - all here in Fairway DLC!

name: Urban Flow: Winter Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fuze Player
description:
Hundreds of games have been developed using the award winning Fuze 4 Nintendo Switch coding app. The Fuze Showcase Gallery was created to highlight the best submissions.

However as many of these are so good, Fuze decided it was best to make them available beyond the Fuze community.

The Fuze Player includes more than 20 games developed by Fuze and the Arena Community.

Included Games:
- Super Mega Arena Blaster
- Fast Food Dizzy for FUZE
- Crazy 3D Shooter
- Vecroids
- Ninja Scroll
- Know Your Plaice!
- FUZE Bounce
- Asteroid Navigator
- Genial Chess
- Patience Solitaire
- Super Laser Blast
- Motorway Memory
- Missiles
- No Escape from Red Hell
- Vi-Race
- AnimeUltraHyperJump
- Da Bean
- Shapes Mini Game
- Cube Puzzle Toy
- Skatey Cat
- Parasail Pat
- FUZE Fit Adventure 2
… and even more 'Free to Download' titles are being added to the Fuze Showcase Gallery as they become available.

name: Stepsister Shock!
description:
When your mom tells you she's going to remarry, you feel nothing but happiness. That is, until you find out who she's getting married to! The new man in her life has three daughters, one of whom you've known since you were a child...

Your everyday life has gone from dinners alone in front of the TV to fighting over who gets to take the first bath. But this new life isn't all bad, especially considering how cute your new step sisters are...

name: Battle Bears 1: Zombies
description: The very first Battle Bears game ever now on PC! Relive the Huggables, Campy Weapons, Crazy Bosses and Funny Cutscenes. Your childhood nostalgia is back in full force!

name: Dört Model Müzesi
description: Four model contents in public relations, which is one of the topics in public relations education, have been developed to support the educational process using virtual reality technology.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Pixel Art Master
description: Jigsaw Puzzle - Pixel Art Master Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Jigsaw Puzzle - Pixel Art Master is designed for Pixel art fans.

name: Rokka
description: Rokka is an atmospheric Winter War simulator where you achieve a "defensive victory" by shooting incoming enemy soldiers and tanks. The game features adult humor.

name: Arcane Eyes
description: Arcane Eyes is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Jane Angel 2: Fallen Heaven
description: A hidden object adventure in which detective Jane Angel disappears under dramatical circumstances. Jane's stepsister, Nancy starts investigating the case full of challenges like an ancient curse, a sophisticated conspiracy and secret relationships.
